title: Mastering AutoCAD: 2D Drafting & 3D Modeling
description:
Welcome to “Mastering AutoCAD: 2D Drafting & 3D Modeling,” a complete, hands-on course designed to help you build professional computer-aided design (CAD) skills using AutoCAD. Whether you’re an aspiring designer, architect, engineer, or student, this course provides a structured pathway to master the essential tools, commands, and workflows needed to create accurate technical drawings and 3D models.

You’ll begin with the fundamentals of AutoCAD, learning about the interface, workspace customization, and coordinate systems. Then, you’ll dive into drawing and modification tools, exploring commands for lines, arcs, circles, offsets, trimming, and filleting. You’ll also learn how to use layers, dimensions, text annotations, and blocks to organize and communicate your designs effectively.

Once the basics are mastered, the course transitions into 3D modeling, where you’ll learn to create and edit 3D objects, apply materials, control views, and render realistic visualizations. Through guided exercises, you’ll practice real-world drafting and modeling techniques used in engineering and architectural projects.

This course emphasizes hands-on learning, encouraging you to work alongside the instructor using practical examples and design exercises. By the end, you’ll confidently create, edit, and manage professional CAD drawings that meet industry standards.

Whether you aim to start a career in design or upgrade your existing skills, this course provides the foundation you need to bring your ideas to life with precision and creativity.

Enroll today and start your journey toward becoming an AutoCAD professional!

title: REALISTIC 3D ASIAN MALE FACE
description:
In this detailed breakdown, I’ll guide you through the creation of a hyper-realistic 3D Asian Male head — focusing on lifelike skin texture, refined facial anatomy, and natural, voluminous hair.

Sculpting: The foundation begins in ZBrush, where I carefully sculpted the head with attention to realistic proportions, facial asymmetry, and subtle anatomical landmarks.

Garment: In this stage, intricate Patterns will be simplified into digestible chunks. Arming you will the right Knowlegde for garment creation in Marvelous Designer

Texturing: Textures were crafted in Substance 3D Painter, using a combination of hand painting and high-resolution skin maps to achieve delicate color variation, pore detail, and subsurface scattering characteristics appropriate for light-toned skin.

Hair Grooming: The hairstyle was created using XGen in Maya, with individually controlled guides to shape soft, flowing strands that frame the face naturally and enhance the character's realism.

Rendering: Final renders were completed in Arnold for Maya, using a cinematic lighting setup and realistic skin shaders to bring out depth, mood, and subtle detail in every frame.

Whether you're learning hyper-realistic character creation or building your next standout portfolio piece, this is a must-watch breakdown.

Tools Used:

  • ZBrush (for sculpting)

  • Marvelous Designer (garment creation)

  • Substance 3D Painter (for texturing)

  • Maya & XGen (for hair grooming)

  • Arnold (for final rendering)

title: Mastering Miro: Visual Collaboration Made Easy
description:
In today’s fast-paced world, visual collaboration is the key to turning ideas into action — and Miro makes it easier than ever. This course will guide you step-by-step through everything you need to know to use Miro confidently, whether you’re a student, designer, project manager, or team leader.

You’ll learn how to create engaging online whiteboards, build visual workflows, organize brainstorming sessions, and collaborate in real-time with your team or clients. Miro’s simple yet powerful tools allow you to map out strategies, plan projects, create mind maps, and share your ideas visually.

Throughout this course, you’ll explore Miro’s most essential features — from templates and sticky notes to advanced collaboration tools and integrations with popular platforms like Slack, Microsoft Teams, and Google Workspace. You’ll also gain insights into using Miro for remote meetings, agile projects, and team retrospectives.

By the end, you’ll have the confidence to use Miro to visualize complex ideas, manage team collaboration efficiently, and present your projects in a clear, creative, and interactive way. No prior experience is required — just your imagination and willingness to learn.

This course is designed to help you unlock your creativity and work smarter through the power of visual collaboration. Let's join us now.

description:
In today’s fast-paced digital world, creating designs that are not only beautiful but also meaningful is essential. This course, “Principles and Practices for UI and UX Designers,” is designed to help students, beginners, and professionals understand the core foundation of user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design. Whether you are just starting your design journey or looking to strengthen your existing skills, this course will equip you with the knowledge, tools, and mindset to design products that people truly love to use.

The course begins with an introduction to the basic principles of UI and UX, explaining how design decisions impact user behavior, accessibility, and engagement. You’ll learn about visual hierarchy, typography, color theory, layout design, and usability — all essential components of effective user interfaces. Moving further, you’ll explore user-centered design practices, focusing on research methods, wireframing, prototyping, and user testing.

Real-world examples and case studies will help you connect theory with practical design challenges. You’ll also understand how to create smooth, intuitive, and inclusive digital experiences that adapt to user needs and preferences.

By the end of this course, you will have a clear understanding of how to design digital products that are both aesthetically pleasing and functionally efficient. You’ll be ready to apply professional design principles to websites, mobile apps, and other interactive platforms with confidence.

title: KAVACH (IRATP) - Automatic Train Protection (ATP) System
description:
This comprehensive training program is designed to equip Signal & Telecommunication (S&T) Team with an in-depth understanding of the Stationary Kavach System—India’s indigenous Train Collision Avoidance System (TCAS). The course provides a structured, detailed, and practical exploration of how Kavach enhances operational safety, prevents collisions, and supports efficient train movement across diverse railway environments.

The module begins with an introduction to the purpose, scope, and functionality of Station Kavach, followed by a detailed study of its major subsystems. Participants will learn the architecture and working principles of Station Kavach implementations by Medha, HBL, and Kernex, gaining the ability to identify similarities, differences, and make-specific features. The training thoroughly covers essential components such as the Station Master Operation Cum Indication Panel (SM-OCIP), Remote Interface Unit (RIU), vital computer systems, and RF communication towers.

A major part of the course focuses on RFID tags—introducing their purpose, classification, fixing arrangements, and their role in the Track Identification Number (TIN) scheme. Learners will study the complete tag layout and understand how Kavach uses RFID data for real-time protection scenarios such as rear-end, side, and head-on collision avoidance.

Hands-on emphasis is placed on relay interface circuits, station-level control logic, maintenance practices, system health monitoring, and detailed troubleshooting for each OEM. Flowcharts, diagrams, and case-based examples help participants build strong diagnostic skills to quickly identify and resolve faults.

By the end of the course, students will be fully prepared to install, configure, operate, maintain, and troubleshoot Station Kavach systems, ensuring safe, reliable, and efficient railway operations.
headline: Comprehensive Training on Station Kavach Architecture, Subsystems, Maintenance & Safety

title: Mastering Custom Metahuman Creation: Easy Facial & Body Mesh
description:
Creating a custom Metahuman that looks unique — with a modified face and body — is one of the most technically challenging tasks in Unreal Engine.
But in this course, you’ll learn how to make the process simple, efficient, and production-ready.

This course breaks down the full workflow step-by-step using Unreal Engine 5.6, Autodesk Maya, ZBrush, and ZWrap — from exporting your Metahuman to sculpting new features and bringing everything back into Unreal seamlessly.

You’ll discover how to:

  • Export and prepare Metahuman DCC files from Unreal Engine.

  • Sculpt new head and body shapes in ZBrush with full control.

  • Use ZWrap to transfer vertex data perfectly onto the original Metahuman mesh.

  • Import your custom mesh back into UE5.6 using the Conform Mesh system.

  • Fix skin weights, polish details, and ensure full rig and facial compatibility.

By the end of this course, you’ll be able to create your own fully custom Metahuman characters that are ready for cinematic animation, games, or high-end visualization projects — without losing facial expressions or breaking the rig.


What makes this course special

  • Teaches you complex Metahuman editing in the easiest possible way.

  • Built for artists, not just technicians — clear steps, visual explanations, and real project workflow.

  • Uses official plugins and production-proven tools (Metahuman for Maya, ZWrap, UE5.6).

By the end of this course, you’ll be able to:

- Sculpt and modify Metahuman faces and bodies like a pro.
- Keep full compatibility with Metahuman rigging and facial animation.
- Build unique, game-ready or cinematic-ready characters in Unreal Engine 5.6.
- Master a simple but powerful workflow connecting UE, Maya, ZBrush, and ZWrap.
headline: Turn complex Metahuman editing into an easy, step-by-step process — sculpt, wrap, and rebuild custom characters fast.

title: AutoCat Job-Ready in 3 Hours/The Beginner's Quick Start 2025
description:
Welcome! You’ve just taken a pivotal step toward mastering one of the most powerful tools in design and engineering: AutoCAD. This isn’t just another course—it’s a meticulously crafted training experience engineered to accelerate your career, amplify your income, and unlock your creative potential. Whether you’re a beginner or a seasoned drafter seeking refinement, this program meets you where you are—and propels you far beyond.

The Result of Six Months of Real-World Mastery

Every module you’ll encounter has been shaped through 6 months of intensive research, hands-on testing, and iterative problem-solving in live design environments. We didn’t just compile tutorials—we reverse-engineered the workflow of top-tier professionals to identify exactly what skills drive results. The outcome? A curriculum that blends foundational knowledge with industry-proven strategies that directly translate to higher efficiency, better client outcomes, and increased earning power.

Comprehensive Coverage: From Fundamentals to Advanced Innovation

This AutoCAD training series leaves no stone unturned. You’ll start with core drafting principles—line work, layers, dimensions, and precision drawing—then rapidly advance into complex 2D detailing, 3D modeling, annotation standards, and dynamic block creation. We go beyond software mechanics to teach you how and why professionals structure drawings for clarity, scalability, and collaboration. Each concept is reinforced through real-world projects: architectural floor plans, mechanical schematics, civil site layouts, and more—mirroring the exact challenges you’ll face on the job.

Why This Course Stands Apart

While many courses stop at tool demonstrations, ours immerses you in a designer’s mindset. We emphasize workflow optimization, industry best practices, and time-saving shortcuts used by experts—helping you work 10x faster without sacrificing accuracy. Our content is continuously updated to align with the latest AutoCAD releases and ISO/DIN drafting standards, ensuring your skills remain relevant and competitive. Plus, you’ll gain exclusive access to custom templates, libraries, and automation scripts that streamline your entire design process.

Learn by Doing—The Smart Way

Forget passive watching. Here, you learn through creation. Every lesson includes guided exercises, design challenges, and peer-reviewed assignments that simulate real client briefs. You’ll receive actionable feedback, iterate on your work, and build a professional portfolio—all while internalizing techniques that stick. This active, project-based approach ensures you don’t just know AutoCAD—you command it.

Built for Confidence—and Career Growth

By the end of this journey, you won’t just be proficient—you’ll be job-ready. You’ll understand how to produce construction-ready drawings, collaborate with BIM teams, optimize files for printing and sharing, and present your work with professional polish. These are the exact competencies employers and clients value most. And because we teach with clarity and purpose, even complex topics become intuitive.

Join a Thriving Community of Design Innovators

You’re not learning in isolation. As a student, you’ll gain access to our exclusive community of designers, engineers, and architects. Participate in live Q&A sessions, share your progress, get critiques, and network with peers who share your ambition. Our instructors don’t just teach—they mentor, offering personalized support that extends well beyond course completion.

Your Investment in a Future-Proof Career

Enrolling in this course is a strategic decision—one that positions you at the forefront of the design industry. The demand for skilled AutoCAD professionals continues to grow across architecture, manufacturing, infrastructure, and more. Equip yourself not just with software knowledge, but with practical design intelligence that opens doors to freelance gigs, promotions, and global opportunities.

What’s Next After Mastery?

Congratulations in advance—you’re about to level up. And when you’re ready to go even deeper, explore our advanced course catalog. From AutoCAD Civil 3D and Revit integration to automation with AutoLISP, we offer specialized pathways to help you dominate your niche.

Final Words of Encouragement

We’re honored that you’ve chosen this AutoCAD training as your vehicle for growth. Every lesson has been poured over, tested, and polished with one goal: your success. Be proud of the initiative you’ve shown—because the designers of tomorrow start exactly where you are today.

title: Getting Started with ServiceNow Lists
description:
This course is designed to put you in control and transform those overwhelming ServiceNow lists into clear, actionable information.

We'll take you on a comprehensive journey, building your knowledge step by step.

In this course, you will learn to:

  • Navigate with confidence: Start with a full tour of the ServiceNow list interface, including all essential features, menus, and actions.

  • Sort like a Pro: Arrange your ServiceNow data in ascending or descending order using single-click sorting or advanced, multi-level sorting.

  • Group for clarity: Categorize your information by any field (like Priority or State) to organize large lists and identify patterns and trends.

  • Find data fast: Unlock the power of searching, from simple column searches to using powerful wildcard characters (*, %, !,=) to refine your results.

  • Personalize your view: Make your ServiceNow lists truly yours. You'll learn to add, remove, and reorder columns to create custom views that fit your exact requirements.

  • Edit efficiently: Master the most critical skill for productivity. Learn to perform single-field changes and time-saving bulk updates in ServiceNow, mostly without ever leaving your list view.

This course is designed for any ServiceNow user—whether you're a project manager, team lead, IT support professional, or an individual contributor looking to boost personal productivity. No prior ServiceNow experience is necessary.


Enroll now and start transforming how you work in ServiceNow, bringing clarity and efficiency to your daily work.

description:
The Civil 3D course is a comprehensive program designed for engineers, students, and professionals who want to gain practical, hands-on expertise in modern civil engineering design and drafting. This course provides a complete understanding of Civil 3D tools and workflows, enabling learners to efficiently handle real-world infrastructure projects. Participants will begin with importing and managing survey data, creating detailed surfaces, and generating accurate contours, topography, and terrain models for effective project planning.

Learners will then focus on designing horizontal and vertical alignments, profiles, and corridors — critical for roads, highways, and land development projects. The course also covers advanced grading techniques, earthwork calculations, and the design of pipe networks for stormwater, sewer, and drainage systems. Students will gain practical experience in generating cross-sections, performing quantity takeoffs, and preparing professional construction-ready drawings.

Through a combination of theory, practical exercises, and real-world project workflows, this course equips learners with the skills to plan, design, and deliver infrastructure projects efficiently. By the end of the program, participants will be confident in using Civil 3D for roadway, highway, and land development projects, as well as drainage and utility systems.

Whether you are a civil engineering student aiming to enhance your career prospects or a working professional seeking to upgrade your design and drafting skills, this Civil 3D course provides the knowledge, practical experience, and industry-ready skills needed to succeed in the modern infrastructure design and construction industry.

title: Complete Blender beginner workflow for Cinematic Art 2025
description:
What does this package contain?

- 4+ hour-long step-by-step tutorial in which we create the animation you can see below + final .blend file

- Smart trees asset pack - Considering that a good part of the scene falls on trees, I decided to share my Smart trees asset pack with you.

With the Smart Trees asset pack, you can create the most detailed CG trees in Blender (more in the intro video)
- Two smaller asset packages - photo-scanned ground and photo-scanned trash that can be useful in the scene we create.

TUTORIAL

The entire process of creating scenes is recorded step-by-step, making the tutorial easy to follow even for beginners and requiring no other software than Blender (free).

We will go through all the processes of creating a scene. From collecting information, reference images, organization, to modeling, texturing, unwrapping, lighting, animation, post-processing, and more.

BAR MODELING

In the first 13 lessons lasting about 2 hours and 20 minutes, we’ll turn a house found on Google Maps into a bar using modeling techniques.

In this part of the tutorial, I’ll show you how to model fast using shortcut keys and modifiers, and how to make a low-poly model look detailed in the camera, creating shaders to bring out as much detail as possible.

BAR INTERIOR

In the second part of the tutorial, we will model and texture the bar from the inside.

We’ll use a lot of emissive shaders here, and since the bar is farther from the camera, I’ll show you an easy way to make it look highly detailed without spending a lot of time.

CREATING THE ENVIRONMENT

With the bar completed, we’ll move on to creating a cinematic scene around it.

In this part, we’ll cover everything you need to create a cinematic scene — from camera setup and render settings to lighting and composition. I’ll show you how to achieve a cinematic, misty look using volumetrics, where to find great free models, how to create materials, and more.

At the end of the tutorial, you will be able to create the animation from the video above as well as much more.

With around six years of experience in Blender, I’m excited to share many of the things I've learned along the way.

ASSETS INCLUDES

- Smart trees asset pack

- Ground photo-scans

- Trash-garbage photo scans

- 6 house models

- final .blend file

Do you want to fully understand Clip Studio Paint in a hands-on way? No matter if you are migrating from another program or you are just starting with digital art.

Then this is the course for you!


In this course you will learn all about the following topics: All the basics of Clip Studio Paint, Basic Movements, Creating new layers and folders, Download & Import brushes, Using the brush and eraser, Clipping layers and Alpha lock, Selection tool, Transform tool, Liquify & Smudge, Fill tool & Gradients, Resizing your Canvas, Implementing text, Ruler tool (Includes Symmetry tool), Layer Modes, Layer Masks, Saving & Export, Geometry tool, Easier Layer navigation, Mesh & Puppet transform, Timelapse feature, Clip Studio Assets, Quick filters & Effects, Colour correction & Adjustments, Brush Settings, Layer Properties, Smoother Selections, Using 3D, Register Image Material, Tips for Lineart, Doublicating your workspace, Auto actions, Colourize feature, Vector layers, Magnetic Lasso for faster selection, Effects, Creating file objects, Layer modes, Using the grid and plenty of live videos of how to draw in Clip Studio Paint.



But what will you learn in detail in this course?

  • Section 1: Basics

    Start your journey with Clip Studio Paint by mastering the essentials. You’ll learn how to set up your workspace, navigate the interface like a pro, and understand how layers, brushes, and selections work together to create digital art. From customizing your layout to using tools like the Transform, Fill, and Ruler features, you’ll gain a complete understanding of the foundation you need to bring your ideas to life. By the end of this section, you’ll be fully comfortable inside CSP and ready to start creating confidently.

  • Section 2: Advanced Features

    Once you know the basics, it’s time to go deeper. In this section, you’ll explore the powerful features that make Clip Studio Paint a favorite among professional illustrators and animators. You’ll learn how to use geometry and mesh tools for precise adjustments, how to enhance your work with color corrections, filters, and effects, and how to create captivating timelapse recordings of your art process. You’ll also discover how to take advantage of Clip Studio Assets to level up your creative workflow.

  • Section 3: Special Features

    Here’s where things get exciting. You’ll unlock the more hidden and advanced tools that transform your art from good to professional. Learn how to fine-tune brushes, use 3D references, automate tasks with auto actions, and colorize sketches in seconds. You’ll also dive into vector layers, grids, and magnetic selections for ultra-clean lineart and efficient editing. This section turns you into a true Clip Studio expert who knows how to make the software work for you.

  • Section 4: Demonstration

    Now it’s time to bring everything together. In the final demonstration, you’ll watch the entire creative process in action—from sketch to finished artwork—using the tools, techniques, and shortcuts you’ve mastered throughout the course. This section connects theory and practice, showing you exactly how a professional artist approaches a complete project inside Clip Studio Paint.


Our Satisfaction Guarantee

We have a 30 day 100% money back guarantee. So if you are not satisfied with your purchase, you will get all your money back immediately!


We are looking forward to welcoming you to the first lesson of the Clip Studio Paint Masterclass!

Wencke & Marius

title: Create a Digital Artwork with Krita: From Idea to Execution
description:
This is a course for both beginners and experienced digital artists.

The art of digital painting allows you to express yourself in an infinite amount of ways. I want to share what I've learned over the years by guiding you through the creation of a great painting while giving you many many tips along the way.

This is my approach to making a digital painting, explained in the most detailed and understandable way possible.

I have carefully put this course together to make digital art more accessible and enable others to give life to their ideas. From basic principles that you should always follow to advanced tips that take your art to the next level. I've included many practical strategies that you can use far beyond this course.

In a project-based way, you will create a full value artwork with the free software Krita, that you can use as a wallpaper. Just follow me and discover the ways of making great digital art!
During the process I will tell you what I'm thinking at all times, so you get a deeper understanding of digital art.

At the start I'm going to give you an overview for Krita so you know the basics of using this amazing program.

We're going to continue by collecting ideas for an artwork and forging them into a pleasing composition by using art and design principles.

Then we're going to make a sketch for the actual artwork. Which we'll follow up by carefully filling everything with the according colors and details.

So in the end you will have a full value artwork that has (hopefully) taught you many generally applicable principles about art. So you should be able to repeat this process for an infinite amount of your future artworks.

I'm going to conclude the course by giving you more general advice for your art journey and showing you how you can progress consistently as an artist.

And that's pretty much it. Watch the lessons to find out what it's all about!

I'm excited to see how it works for you :)

title: Blender for Architecture - Create a house from scratch
description:
Blender 4.5 Training Course – 3D Architecture

Do you dream of creating realistic and professional 3D architectural renderings? This comprehensive Blender 4.5 training course is designed to guide you step by step through modeling and enhancing a modern home and its surroundings.

Training Objectives

At the end of the course, you will be able to model a complete house, design its interior and exterior spaces, create a realistic natural environment, master lighting, and achieve the final rendering. A true 3D architecture project from A to Z!

Program

The training is structured into six progressive chapters:

Modeling the house: floors, ceilings, walls, openings.

Secondary structures: terrace, swimming pool, stairs, railings, and pillars.

Exterior design: land, trees, plants, lawn, and decor.

Furniture and decoration: adding interior and exterior furniture and decorative elements.

Lighting: HDRI, interior lighting, and ambient effects.

Texturing and rendering: realistic shaders, final rendering, and compositing.

Instructor

I'm Julien Deville, a Blender instructor for over 10 years, both online and in-house. I share my experience and techniques to help you progress efficiently and develop your 3D projects.

Included in the course

All source files are included to allow you to easily follow along, practice, and revisit each step.

Learning accessible to everyone, even if you're new to 3D architecture.

Expected outcome

In just a few weeks, you'll have all the skills you need to create your own 3D architectural projects, produce photorealistic renderings, and enhance your portfolio.

Join the training today and get started in 3D architecture with Blender 4.5!

title: Claude AI for Creatives: Learn by Building Projects
description:
Ready to learn Claude AI without boring tutorials?

This isn't another dry AI course filled with technical jargon and theory. This is learning by making things you actually care about.

You'll master Claude AI by building real creative projects from scratch - worldbuilding documents, tabletop game systems, stories, manga scripts, and marketing campaigns. Every lesson teaches you Claude fundamentals through hands-on work that results in portfolio-worthy projects.

Why This Course Works

Most AI courses teach you commands and features in isolation. We teach you collaboration workflows - how to brainstorm with Claude, iterate on ideas, manage long projects, convert formats, and actually finish creative work. You learn Claude by using it the way real creatives do.

What You'll Actually Build

  • Original alien civilization with complete worldbuilding and lore

  • Tabletop RPG system with rules, characters, monsters, and adventures

  • Multi-format content - the same story as prose, manga script, and game design doc

  • Marketing campaigns with strategy, content plans, and analytics


Skills That Transfer Everywhere

While we build games and stories, you're learning universal Claude skills: effective prompting, task decomposition, iterative refinement, format conversion, project management, and professional workflows. Apply these to writing, design, marketing, education, or any creative field.



Who This Course is For

Perfect for creative professionals, writers, artists, designers, and small business owners who want to learn AI through doing, not watching. Ideal if you're intimidated by technical AI courses or frustrated by tools that feel robotic. This teaches you to work with Claude as a creative partner, not just prompt a machine.


No Prerequisites Needed



Zero coding experience required. Zero game design knowledge required. Zero marketing background required. We teach you Claude AI - the creative projects are just our fun, engaging teaching method.

Course Structure

Section 1: Get started immediately - setup, interface, and your first project
Section 2: Master fundamentals through worldbuilding exercises
Section 3: Advanced techniques via game system design
Section 4: Format conversion superpowers
Section 5: Expert personas and professional workflows
Section 6: Real-world marketing and business applications

Your Instructor

I've spent years working with AI tools in creative production, figuring out what actually works versus what sounds good in theory. This course distills those hard-won lessons into a fun, practical learning path that respects your time and intelligence.

What Makes This Different

  • Project-based learning that produces real portfolio pieces

  • No fluff - every lesson teaches practical skills you'll use immediately

  • Human teaching style - encouraging, witty, and actually helpful

  • Multiple creative domains - see how Claude adapts across different work

  • Completion focus - you'll finish projects, not just start them

By the end of this course, you'll have multiple finished creative projects AND the Claude AI skills to tackle whatever creative challenges you face next.

Ready to build something cool? Let's go.

description:
If you’ve ever wondered how to create a professional-looking online store without needing to code or hire an expensive developer… this course is for you. Whether you’re a freelancer, small-business owner, marketer, side-hustler or just someone looking to create an eCommerce presence quickly — I’ll walk you through each step using Wix Studio’s interface. This course will guide you step-by-step through building a fully functional eCommerce store using Wix Studio — even if you have never created a website before. You will learn how to set up your Wix Studio workspace, select and customize a professional store template, add products with variations and pricing, manage inventory, and organize collections.


You’ll also configure secure payment gateways, shipping options, tax settings, and checkout features to ensure your store is ready to receive real orders. As we design your storefront, you’ll learn how to create high-converting product pages, improve user experience, and make your website fully responsive so it looks great on both desktop and mobile devices.

title: Master SOLIDWORKS CAD Design & 3D Modeling
description:
Topic of this course is a wheel (rim and tyre) which in it's design hides many interesting SolidWorks features. It's an amazing workflow which can be implemented in many other types of 3D models so I really hope you will be able to complete the course well and integrate this knowledge in some of your upcoming projects.

Aside from simply ,,using features" I was heavily focused on maximizing the use of the ,,feature tree" which allows SolidWorks users to literally go back and forward in time, manipulate different dimensions, features and their order which in total defines the 3D model.

Perhaps the most important part of the course is understanding this back and forth capability and how to use it. It allows you to make many mistakes but if you've built your model cleanly from the start you will be awarded and SolidWorks will allow you to change many things ,,in past" and then come back again and see the results of these changes in real-time.

You might also notice I've tried to keep the number of sketches and sketch elements as low as possible so we can solely focus on the process itself and main features like surface design, cuts, mirrors and similar.

I did not intend to put a too heavy workflow on your shoulders so this is why I also pre-made couple of small components and your duty will be to incorporate them in already existing model, which is of course something you will learn how to do if you haven't had a chance earlier.

At the end you will get a glimpse of how the 3D rendering process looks like and how easy it actually is to go from a finished model  to a rendered but realisticaly looking image.

Make sure to leave a comment and let me know how you liked the course!

title: Create a Low Poly Scene in Blender and Unity
description:
Learn the foundations of low-poly 3D asset creation quickly and efficiently, without spending weeks in a long, overwhelming course.


In this one-hour, hands-on project, you will create a complete low-poly underground scene using Blender and Unity 6. You’ll start in Blender, where I’ll walk you through the entire modeling process step by step, learning how to use essential tools such as loop cuts, modifiers, and simple forms to create stylized geometry. Then, you’ll bring your scene into Unity, where we’ll explore lighting, post-processing, and basic level art techniques to make your environment come to life.

Along the way, you’ll also discover useful tips and workflow shortcuts that will help you create faster and more efficiently, even if you’ve never worked in 3D before.

By the end of this course, you’ll have a finished, playable low-poly scene and the confidence to start building your own game environments and 3D projects.

This course is perfect for beginners who are new to Blender and Unity, artists who want to learn the fundamentals of environment creation, or anyone who values quick, practical learning and wants to see real results in just one hour.


This course will give you the confidence to kickstart your game development career.

title: AutoCAD for Landscape Designers: From Zero to Advanced Level
description:
This is a comprehensive AutoCAD course specifically designed for urban planners, Urban Designers, Landscape Architects, and enthusiasts to master AutoCAD for professional, real-world urban and landscape projects.

You’ll begin with the fundamentals — exploring the interface, 2D drafting, modification tools, layer management, hatching, and annotation — and gradually progress to advanced workflows including georeferencing aerial images, automating repetitive tasks with LISP scripts, and creating complex 3D urban and landscape models.

Unlike traditional courses, this program emphasizes practical, project-based workflows, helping you gain skills that you can apply immediately in professional projects. Throughout the course, you’ll complete multiple real-world projects, such as:

  • Street design and detailed cross-sections

  • Site layout planning and analysis

  • 3D city modeling and urban infrastructure elements

  • Twinmotion visualization projects, where your AutoCAD models are transformed into photorealistic renders

With specialized LISP scripts, you’ll automate time-consuming tasks such as area calculation, slope analysis, coordinate placement, dimensioning, and numbering — significantly improving your speed and efficiency.

By the end of this course, you will be able to:

  • Design and document complete urban and landscape projects in AutoCAD

  • Apply LISP automation for faster, more efficient workflows

  • Build detailed 3D models for city and landscape projects

  • Export AutoCAD projects to Twinmotion for photorealistic visualization

  • Prepare professional, presentation-ready sheets, diagrams, and layouts for clients, competitions, or academic submissions

This course offers lifetime access, so you can learn at your own pace, revisit lessons anytime. Full instructor support ensures guidance at every step of your learning journey.

Whether you are an urban planner, landscape designer, or aspiring city designer, this course will equip you with all the AutoCAD and visualization skills needed for professional urban and landscape projects.

title: PLASTIC TRIMS WITH CATIA V5
description:
Are you ready to become an industry-ready CATIA V5 Design Engineer?
This course is designed to transform you from a beginner into a confident professional capable of handling real-world plastic and automotive component design projects. Whether you’re a student, fresher, or working engineer looking to upgrade your skills, this structured program will help you master CATIA V5 step by step.

We’ll start with the basics of plastics, understanding materials, manufacturing constraints, and design properties essential for modern product development. Then, we’ll move into the CATIA V5 Sketcher, covering almost every command used in industrial applications with practical examples and exercises.

Next, you’ll explore Part Modeling, where you’ll learn how to create parametric components with proper design intent, ensuring every part is efficient, editable, and production-ready. The course then advances into Surface Modeling, where you’ll gain hands-on experience with essential tools like Sweep, Multi-Section, and Power Copy — critical for complex automotive design.

Finally, you’ll apply everything in real-world projects, including designing a Cap, Fog Lamp, and Armrest — just like professionals do in the industry.

By the end of this course, you’ll have a strong portfolio, industrial-level confidence, and the skills to excel as a CATIA V5 Design Engineer -- see you in the main course

title: Sora 2 x Veo 3.1 in Higgsfield Ai |  Ai Videos For Beginners
description:
This course contains the use of artificial intelligence. And Ai voice overs.

The Complete Beginner's Guide to AI Video Creation

Welcome to the future of content creation! If you've been looking for a fast, powerful way to generate stunning, high-quality video content without complicated software, this course is for you. This is the ultimate beginner's experience in generative video, guiding you step-by-step through the industry's most advanced models: OpenAI Sora 2 and Google Veo 3.1, housed entirely within the user-friendly Higgsfield AI platform.

Forget complex editing timelines, expensive cameras, and years of practice. You will learn to bypass traditional production hurdles by turning simple text prompts into cinematic, photorealistic, or stylized short video clips in minutes.

We start with zero prerequisites. You'll gain a foundational understanding of how these powerful models work, then immediately jump into hands-on projects, focusing on getting consistent results for social media and marketing. By mastering the Higgsfield AI interface, you will quickly switch between the hyper-realistic output of Sora 2 and the detailed control of Veo 3.1.

Whether you're a content creator seeking viral-worthy clips, a marketer needing budget-friendly ads, or just an enthusiast exploring cutting-edge technology, this is the most direct path to becoming proficient in AI video production today.

What You Will Learn (Learning Objectives)

* Execute the Full Workflow on Higgsfield AI: Confidently navigate the Higgsfield AI platform to generate, edit, and export videos using both the Sora 2 and Veo 3.1 models.

* Generate High-Quality, Consistent Videos: Apply advanced prompt engineering to achieve precise character and scene consistency across multiple clips for cohesive storytelling.

* Master Core AI Video Concepts: Understand the foundational differences and ideal use cases for Sora 2 and Veo 3.1 within the Higgsfield AI environment.

* Utilize Beginner-Friendly Features: Leverage all the key editing tools and features unique to the Higgsfield AI platform to refine your AI-generated video outputs.

Who This Course Is For

* Absolute Beginners with zero experience in video production or AI who are curious about creating high-quality, professional-looking clips simply by using text prompts.

* Social Media Content Creators who need to generate a high volume of engaging, dynamic video content quickly and affordably.

* Digital Marketers and Small Business Owners looking to create stunning video ads, product showcases, or explainer videos for their brands.

* Artists and Creatives who want to use generative AI for rapid storyboarding, prototyping, and bringing imaginative concepts to life.

title: Clothes and Folds exercises course
description:
In this course we will make 3D clothes in Blender. Lots of them!

Most artists sculpt flat lifeless fabric. But after this course you won't be one of them :).

We are building 20 pro level clothes in this course, and i will guide you in real time trough the process of creating each one of them from scratch.


My name is Niko and i am 3D character artist and educator with over 15 years of experience in the game industry. I have released over 15 video courses about Blender, Zbrush, 3D character creation and human anatomy. Over 30 000 students have enrolled in my courses to learn those topics. I also have 2 youtube channels - Speedchar and Speedchar live.


So this course will start by talking about folds foundations, and pretty quickly we will start to make jeans, then tank top, then tshirt. And we will go trough shorts, bra, female Tshirt, dress, female leather jacket, a cape, official pants, shirt and trenchcoat, hoodie, sport pants, a glove, leather jacket with zippers and belt, Aladin pants and military pants. All this in real time, talking about making clothes and folds for 3D game characters.


This course is made in Blender, so a bit of knowledge of Blender would be required.


In the Project files you will find male and female basemeshes, which i made and i am using in the course, also some shoes and all the references you need for the course in a Pureref file.


Ready to level up your cloth game?

Enroll now —And let the fold be with you!

title: Autodesk Inventor Job-Ready/The Beginner's Quick Start 2025
description:
Stop dreaming about a career in engineering design and start building it. Welcome to the most definitive, all-encompassing, and career-transforming Autodesk Inventor 2025 course ever created. This is not just another software tutorial; it is a complete professional incubator designed to take you from an absolute beginner, with zero prior experience, and forge you into a confident, highly-skilled, and job-ready mechanical design professional. We have meticulously engineered this program to be the equivalent of five individual courses in one, delivering unparalleled value and a skill set that will make you an indispensable asset in today's competitive engineering landscape.

Are you tired of courses that just show you where the buttons are, leaving you to figure out the why and the how on your own? Do you worry that the skills you're learning aren't what employers are actually looking for? I understand that frustration completely. That is why I have invested over six months of intensive research and real-world application to build this course from the ground up. I didn't just sit in front of a camera; I lived and breathed Autodesk Inventor, applying every advanced technique and professional workflow to complex, real-world engineering projects. I dissected the challenges, streamlined the processes, and uncovered the secrets to maximum productivity. After achieving remarkable results and refining these methods to perfection, I made it my mission to distill this hard-won knowledge into a single, transformative learning experience. This course is the culmination of that journey—a direct, no-nonsense pipeline to the exact skills that employers are desperately seeking and are willing to pay a premium for.

What Makes This Course The Ultimate Choice?

In a sea of online courses, you need to know you're making the right investment. Here is why this program is fundamentally different and superior:

  • The "5-in-1" Super-Course: We've packed the value of five separate courses into one comprehensive package. You get Complete Beginner Training, Advanced Part & Assembly Modeling, Professional Drawing & Documentation, Introduction to Simulation & Analysis, and Career & Portfolio Development. You will not need to buy another course on Inventor for years to come.

  • Focus on Professional Workflow, Not Just Tools: Knowing a tool is one thing; knowing how to use it within a professional, efficient workflow is what separates amateurs from pros. We teach you the thinking behind the design, the logic of constraints, and the strategy of building models that are easy to manage, modify, and manufacture.

  • Real-World, Project-Based Learning: Theory is important, but application is everything. You will not just watch me click buttons. You will get your hands dirty with a series of progressively challenging projects that simulate the exact tasks you'll perform in a real engineering role. From a simple bracket to a complex multi-part assembly, you will build a portfolio that proves your skills.

  • The "Job-Ready" Guarantee: Our curriculum is directly aligned with industry demands. We cover the topics that appear in job descriptions and interview questions. We teach you how to create the kind of professional documentation and presentations that will blow hiring managers away. This isn't just about learning Inventor; it's about landing a job.

Your Journey to Mastery: A Detailed Curriculum Breakdown

This course is structured into logical, easy-to-follow modules that build upon each other, ensuring a smooth and effective learning path.

Module 1: The Rock-Solid Foundation

  • Interface & Setup: Master the Autodesk Inventor 2025 interface. Learn to customize your workspace, navigate projects with lightning speed, and set up templates for maximum efficiency from day one.

  • 2D Sketching Mastery: Go beyond basic lines and circles. Dive deep into geometric and dimensional constraints to create intelligent, "live" sketches that form the unshakeable foundation of robust parametric design. This is the most critical skill in all of CAD modeling.

  • Basic Part Modeling: Turn your 2D sketches into 3D reality. Master core features like Extrude, Revolve, Hole, and Fillet, learning the best practices for creating clean, editable solid models.

Module 2: The Core of Mechanical Design

  • Advanced Part Modeling: Tackle complex shapes with Loft, Sweep, and Shell. Learn to use work features and derive components to create sophisticated parts that would otherwise be impossible.

  • The Art of the Assembly: Bring your parts together. Master the 3D assembly environment, understanding the difference between constraints and joints. Learn to build large assemblies efficiently, manage component relationships, and perform interference checks to ensure your designs fit together perfectly.

  • Creating Powerful Presentations: Learn to create stunning exploded views and animated assembly instructions. This is how you communicate your design intent clearly to clients, manufacturers, and marketing teams.

Module 3: From Digital Prototype to Physical Product

  • Professional Engineering Drawings: This is where your design becomes a reality. Master the creation of detailed, standards-compliant engineering drawings. Learn to place dimensions, annotations, GD&T symbols, create parts lists (BOMs), and generate title blocks that are ready for the shop floor.

  • Sheet Metal Design: Enter the specialized world of sheet metal. Master the unique tools for creating flanges, hems, bends, and flat patterns, understanding how bend allowances and reliefs affect the final manufactured part.

  • Weldment Design: Learn to design structural frames and welded assemblies with dedicated tools that simplify the process of adding prep, weld beads, and machining post-weld.

Module 4: The Professional's Edge

  • Introduction to Stress Simulation: Don't just guess if your design is strong enough—prove it. Get a hands-on introduction to the FEA (Finite Element Analysis) environment. Learn to set up and run static stress and modal analysis to validate your designs and make data-driven decisions.

  • Automating with iLogic: Unlock the power of automation within Inventor. Learn the basics of iLogic to create intelligent models that can automatically update dimensions, features, and components based on simple rule changes, saving you hours of repetitive work.

  • Data Management & Collaboration: Understand the critical importance of managing your design files. Learn best practices for file naming, project structure, and collaborating effectively within a team environment.

Module 5: Your Capstone - The Job-Ready Portfolio

  • The Final Project: Put everything you've learned to the test in a comprehensive final project that challenges you to design, assemble, document, and present a complete mechanical system from scratch.

  • Portfolio Development: It's not enough to have the skills; you have to prove them. We will guide you on how to render your models, create professional presentation materials, and compile a portfolio that will get you noticed and hired.

Description

Take the next step in your career! Whether you’re an up-and-coming professional, an experienced executive, aspiring manager, budding Professional. title: Archicad AI Visualizer: Transform Your 3D Designs

visible_instructors.title: CGwisdom Online courses
visible_instructors.name: CGwisdom
visible_instructors.job_title: Advanced courses on graphics and artificial intelligence

description:
Revolutionize Your Architectural Workflow with AI-Powered Visualization

The architectural and design industry is experiencing a transformation driven by artificial intelligence, and professionals who embrace these cutting-edge technologies gain a significant competitive advantage. This comprehensive course introduces you to AI Visualizer for Archicad – an innovative tool that harnesses the power of artificial intelligence to generate stunning, photorealistic visualizations directly from your 3D models. Whether you're an architect, interior designer, or visualization specialist, this course will equip you with the knowledge and skills to leverage AI technology in your daily workflow.

Discover the Power of AI Visualizer for Archicad

AI Visualizer represents a breakthrough in architectural visualization technology. This advanced plugin integrates seamlessly with Archicad, enabling you to create compelling visual presentations without the need for traditional rendering processes or outsourcing to external visualization studios. By combining your 3D models with descriptive text prompts and customizable settings, AI Visualizer generates high-quality images that accurately represent your design intent while saving valuable time and resources.

Throughout this course, you'll explore every aspect of AI Visualizer, from basic functionality to advanced configuration options. You'll learn how to optimize settings to achieve the best possible image quality and ensure that your visualizations faithfully communicate your architectural concepts to clients and stakeholders.

Master Rapid Conceptual Visualization Techniques

One of the most significant advantages of AI Visualizer is its ability to accelerate the conceptual design phase. Traditional visualization methods often require hours or even days to produce a single high-quality image. With AI Visualizer, you can generate multiple design alternatives in minutes, allowing you to present various options to clients quickly and efficiently. This course teaches you how to leverage this speed advantage while maintaining professional quality standards.

You'll discover how to craft effective text prompts that guide the AI to produce exactly the results you envision. Learn the nuances of describing materials, lighting conditions, atmospheric effects, and stylistic preferences in ways that maximize the tool's potential. Through practical examples and demonstrations, you'll develop an intuitive understanding of how to communicate your design vision to the artificial intelligence engine.

Streamline Your Design Presentation Process

Client presentations are critical moments in any architectural project, and the quality of your visualizations can make or break a proposal. This course shows you how to use AI Visualizer to create professional-grade presentation materials that impress clients and win projects. You'll learn strategies for generating multiple views, experimenting with different design options, and quickly iterating based on client feedback – all without the traditional time constraints of manual rendering.

The course covers practical workflows for integrating AI Visualizer into your existing design process. Discover how to move seamlessly from 3D modeling in Archicad to AI-enhanced visualization, maintaining consistency across your project documentation while exploring creative possibilities that traditional methods make impractical.

Explore Advanced Configuration and Optimization

While AI Visualizer is designed to be user-friendly, unlocking its full potential requires understanding its advanced features and settings. This course provides deep insights into the tool's configuration options, teaching you how to fine-tune parameters for optimal results. You'll learn about resolution settings, style controls, prompt engineering techniques, and quality optimization strategies that separate amateur results from professional-grade visualizations.

We address common challenges and limitations, providing practical solutions and workarounds that help you achieve consistent, predictable results. You'll gain confidence in using the tool for real projects, knowing how to troubleshoot issues and adjust your approach when the AI doesn't immediately deliver the expected output.

Understand Real-World Applications and Limitations

Theory without practice is incomplete, which is why this course emphasizes real-world application scenarios. Through detailed case studies and practical demonstrations, you'll see exactly how AI Visualizer performs across different project types – from residential designs to commercial spaces, exterior views to interior scenes. This hands-on approach helps you understand not only what the tool can do, but when and how to deploy it most effectively in your projects.

The course includes an honest, objective assessment of AI Visualizer's capabilities and limitations. We discuss both the impressive strengths of the technology and areas where it currently falls short, helping you set realistic expectations and make informed decisions about incorporating the tool into your workflow. Understanding these limitations is crucial for professional use, ensuring you can reliably deliver quality results to clients.

Stay Ahead of the Technology Curve

Artificial intelligence is rapidly evolving, and the architectural profession must adapt to remain competitive. Even if current AI visualization tools aren't perfect, their development trajectory is clear – AI will play an increasingly central role in design and visualization processes. By learning AI Visualizer now, you position yourself at the forefront of this technological revolution, ready to capitalize on improvements and new capabilities as they emerge.

This course prepares you not just for today's AI tools, but for the AI-enhanced workflows of tomorrow. You'll develop fundamental understanding of how AI approaches visualization challenges, skills that will transfer to future iterations of this technology and other AI-powered design tools that emerge in the coming years.

Accessible Learning for All Skill Levels

You don't need to be a technical expert or fluent in English to benefit from this course. We provide guidance on navigating interface elements and translating settings when necessary, making the technology accessible to designers regardless of their language background. The course is structured to accommodate both Archicad beginners who want to explore AI visualization and experienced users looking to add cutting-edge tools to their skill set.

Join thousands of forward-thinking design professionals who are already leveraging artificial intelligence to enhance their work. Enroll today and discover how AI Visualizer can transform your architectural visualization process, save time, reduce costs, and open new creative possibilities in your design practice.

title: Sustainable Fashion Fundamentals
description:
With 15 years of experience in the textile industry, I specialize in sustainable fashion, from recycled denim fabric development to eco-innovative product marketing, including social media campaigns and video production. My approach blends hands on industry expertise with research-driven insights, shaped by years of collaboration with sustainable fashion NGOs and contributions as a writer for sustainable fashion magazines.


This dual perspective allows me to deliver a holistic understanding of sustainability not just as a textile professional, but as an advocate and communicator. Through this course, I aim to share fundamental yet impactful knowledge on sustainable fashion, equipping participants with both technical skills and a broader vision for ethical innovation.


This course explores the principles of sustainable fashion, examines the environmental and social challenges posed by the textile industry, and highlights the innovations and movements shaping a more responsible future in fashion follow with circularity and fashion and concludes with sustainability approach in denim field.

Learning Objectives

By the end of this course, learners will be able to:

1. Define sustainability and its relevance to the fashion industry

2. Distinguish between fast fashion and sustainable fashion

3. Analyze the environmental and social impacts of textile production

4. Evaluate sustainable alternatives and innovations in materials and practices

5. Identify organizations, certifications, and movements driving change in the industry

6.Having initial information about circularity in fashion and textile.

7. Gaining fundamental information about sustainable denim

8.Ecodesign fundamentals for fashion and textile

Target Audience: Fashion designers, sustainability professionals, supply chain managers, students, and entrepreneurs.


Sustainable Fashion Fundamentals

Modules

1. Introduction to Sustainable Fashion,

2. Circular Fashion

3. Sustainable Denim

4.Ecodesign

title: AI-Powered 3D Modeling for 3D Printing
description:
Welcome to AI-Powered 3D Modeling for 3D Printing, a hands-on course that shows you how to turn your ideas into real 3D-printable designs — powered by artificial intelligence.

Traditional 3D modeling can be time-consuming and difficult to master. This course simplifies that process using AI tools like ChatGPT, AIimagegenerator, Hyper3D, and MakerLab to generate, visualize, and convert your concepts into ready-to-print models. Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced designer, you’ll discover new ways to speed up your workflow and enhance creativity.

You’ll start by using ChatGPT to generate design ideas and detailed text prompts. Then, you’ll use AIimagegenerator or similar AI image generators to bring those ideas to life visually. Next, you’ll convert the generated images into 3D models using Hyper3D and  MakerLab.

By the end of this course, you’ll know how to combine AI tools effectively to create unique, printable designs from scratch. You’ll complete a full AI-driven 3D modeling project, gaining practical skills you can use in design, prototyping, or creative innovation.

Unlock the power of AI in 3D printing and start bringing your imagination to life today!


During this course we will create 5 different designs all from scratch step by step and print all of them!

Welcome to The Eggwhite Campfire — a hands-on, human-centred journey into the art and practice of User Experience. Created by The Eggwhite, this course invites you to gather around the metaphorical campfire, where ideas spark, perspectives shift, and learning becomes both practical and inspiring.


Over 11 focused lessons, you’ll explore the essential principles, strategies, and real-world applications that shape great UX. Whether you’re a designer, product manager, developer, entrepreneur, or simply curious about improving digital experiences, you’ll gain actionable frameworks and creative tools to build products that are not only functional — but meaningful, accessible, and emotionally resonant.


Each lesson combines structured content, real-world examples, and interactive exercises to help you think like a UX'er: empathising with users, defining the right problems, generating ideas, prototyping quickly, and testing with confidence. You’ll also learn to speak the language of UX, map user journeys, tell engaging stories, prioritise design decisions, and measure success through clear metrics and feedback.


From ethical design and gamification to accessibility, AI, and future UX trends, The Eggwhite Campfire offers a perfect balance between theory and application. You’ll gain a deeper understanding of how empathy, strategy, and data intersect to create experiences that truly connect with people.


By the end of the course, you’ll walk away with a personal UX toolkit, downloadable templates, and a strategic mindset ready to design intuitive, inclusive, and human-centred digital products — whatever your next project may be.

title: BIM Leadership: Global Strategies & Standard Implementation

visible_instructors.title: Amir Karami • BIM
visible_instructors.name: Amir
visible_instructors.job_title: BIM Manager, BIM Modeler, Revit, Architect, MEP Modeler

description:
Note: This is not a basic BIM or ISO 19650 overview. In this course, you will learn how Information Requirements, Exchange Workflows, and ISO 19650 processes are actually applied inside real BIM environments—exactly the knowledge you need to work confidently as an Information Manager in modern digital projects.


  1. Are you wondering what truly separates an average BIM user from someone who can manage OIR, AIR, PIR, and lead information workflows in complex projects?

  2. Do you want to understand how PIM and AIM evolve across the asset lifecycle—and why correct modelling and information sequencing matter so much to project success?

  3. Are you looking to learn how Information Delivery, EIR, BIM Protocols, and ISO 19650-2 processes are executed in real projects so you can grow faster in your BIM career?


In this course, I will guide you through the complete structure of Information Management using the ISO 19650 framework, focusing on practical, real-world application. You will learn how organizations define information requirements, how information is delivered in structured workflows, and how roles such as the Information Manager operate inside actual BIM projects.

Throughout the course, we will work with key components like OIR, AIR, PIR, PIM, AIM, classification systems, and delivery-phase procedures.

If your goal is to understand BIM from an information-centric perspective, this course will help you gain that clarity with a structured and professional approach.


Headlines:

Information Requirements Management – Complete skills for defining and controlling OIR, AIR & PIR in BIM projects

Information Model Development – Expert understanding of PIM & AIM across the full asset lifecycle

Level of Information Need – Accurate determination of required geometric and non-geometric detail for each project phase

Information Delivery Management – High-level planning and execution of standardized information deliverables

ISO 19650 Principles – Deep and practical understanding of the international framework for information management

Delivery Phase Execution – Advanced step-by-step application of ISO 19650-2 requirements in real projects

BIM Protocol Compliance – Effective implementation of information contracts and protocols across project teams

BIM Process Standardization – Complete techniques for structuring and improving coordinated digital workflows

Classification Systems Application – Expert use of Uniclass, OmniClass and other standards for organized information retrieval

Information Manager Responsibilities – Professional-level skills for performing the role in a standardized BIM environment

Information Exchange Workflows – Accurate setup and execution of EIR processes in an ISO 19650 framework

Structured Information Modelling – High-detailed methods for managing data consistency across all BIM stages


If you want to grow your BIM career and gain the knowledge needed to work professionally with information workflows, enroll in this course now and start building your expertise from zero to advanced.

And remember—if you have any questions throughout the course, ask me anything. I offer 24/7 support so you can progress confidently and become skilled in this field as quickly as possible.

title: Master SketchUp: Learn by Modeling | Beginner Friendly
description:
Welcome!

Hi, I’m Cam, an architect and teacher with more than 3 years of experience, and over 50 students satisfied worldwide.

I’m thrilled to have you here and to introduce you to this course. This isn’t just a series of tutorials — it’s a hands-on learning experience designed to help you understand SketchUp by actually building something real: a complete 3D house, step by step.

Here’s how the course works:

  • Fast-paced practice → from the very first lesson, you’ll be modeling, so you can see results quickly and stay motivated.

  • Clear, slow-paced explanations → each tool, function, and workflow is explained in detail so that even if you’ve never opened SketchUp before, you’ll never feel left behind.

By the end of the course, you won’t just have a house model on your screen. You’ll have:

  • A solid foundation in SketchUp’s essential tools.

  • The ability to take an idea and turn it into a 3D project.

  • The confidence to keep practicing and even start working on your own designs.

This course is perfect for beginners who want a guided, structured project to start with — but also for hobbyists, students, or professionals in fields like architecture, interior design, or product design who want to add SketchUp to their toolkit.

And remember: if at any point you feel you’d benefit from a more personalized approach, I also offer 1-on-1 training where we can go deeper into your goals.

I can’t wait to see how far you’ll go — let’s start building!

title: Furniture Modeling Masterclass: 3DS Max Start to Finish
description:
Introducing the Ultimate Furniture Modeling Course! With this course you have access to time-tested, production-proven skills and tools that will allow you to efficiently model a wide variety of furniture, ranging from stools, chairs, tables, luxury entertainment chairs, leather couches, and more, as well as quickly create and apply realistic procedural V-Ray materials for fast rendering and presentation.


This course is 100% 3DS Max. No Zbrush, Marvelous Designer, or Substance Painter required! You will learn all kinds of effective tools and tricks to solve issues, such as:


- Snapping with axis constraints

- Cloth simulation

- Procedural avoidance of clipping and adding detail

- Using splines

- A variety of ways to add stitches

- Procedural material creation

- Creating tiling texture maps

And more.


The videos are not fast-forwarded and most of the them are commentated by me in real time but in a few videos I stay quiet as I am doing the same steps explained in previous videos. I also display the hotkeys used in the bottom right corner, and I provide the hotkeys I use in Max.


This course is intended both for complete beginners as well as advanced users who want to add more workflows and techniques to their repertoire with a tested, no-nonsense approach to modeling. No matter what your background or goal, you'll improve your modeling with this course where the information is presented in a clear and concise manner and more tools are added gradually so you won't get overwhelmed.


Ultimate Furniture Modeling Guide. Simple. Effective. Comprehensive. I hope to see you there!

Create realistic, procedural V-Ray materials that render beautifully without relying on external tools like Substance or ZBrush.

title: Rain of Light — Grasshopper Modeling Tutorial of the Louvre
description:
Discover the power of parametric design by recreating one of the world’s most iconic architectural masterpieces — Jean Nouvel’s Louvre Abu Dhabi. Known for its breathtaking dome and the poetic “Rain of Light” effect, this building is a perfect case study to unlock the creative potential of Grasshopper.


This course takes you on a step-by-step journey into parametric modelling. Starting from the basics, you’ll learn how to break down complex forms into manageable components and transform them into dynamic geometries. Through hands-on lessons, you’ll master the logic of Grasshopper, explore advanced modelling techniques, and simulate the dome’s striking interplay of light and shadow.


But the course goes beyond technical skills. By reconstructing the Louvre Abu Dhabi, you’ll gain a deeper appreciation for how digital tools can be used to analyse, reimagine, and innovate within architecture. You’ll see how parametric workflows not only help solve complex design problems but also open new doors for creativity.


Whether you are an architecture student eager to expand your design toolkit, a professional looking to sharpen your computational skills, or simply a design enthusiast fascinated by landmark buildings, this course is designed for you. No prior expertise is required — just curiosity and a willingness to experiment.


By the end of the course, you won’t just have recreated an architectural icon. You’ll have developed the skills, confidence, and inspiration to bring your own complex ideas to life through Grasshopper and parametric design.

title: Using AI for Graphic Design with Adobe Express & Firefly
description:
Welcome to Design Marketing Content with AI in Adobe Express– a project-based course where you’ll learn how to use AI tools to create professional branding, video content, animated characters, and high-impact social media graphics.

Whether you run a small business, manage social content, or want to level up your design skills, this course will show you how to design eye-catching marketing materials quickly and confidently using Adobe Express (free or paid).

You’ll learn how to use the latest AI design tools – including Adobe Firefly, ChatGPT, Google Labs Whisk, and Gemini Flash (aka Nano Banana) – to generate graphics, build brand identity, and create compelling motion content. By the end, you’ll be designing marketing visuals that look polished, modern, and attention-grabbing across Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, LinkedIn, and beyond.


What You’ll Learn

  • How to create animated characters and avatars for branding

  • How to generate logos, icons, type styles and brand kits using AI tools

  • Using ChatGPT & Firefly to create graphics, promotional imagery & content ideas

  • Building colour palettes, font pairings & mood boards for strong branding

  • Creating impressive AI video intros using effective prompting

  • Enhancing voiceovers using AI audio tools

  • Designing scroll-stopping social media posts optimized for multiple platforms

  • Working with image cutouts, text, video, graphics & templates

  • Creating a cohesive brand identity that stands out

Every section includes a hands-on project, so you learn by doing – and finish with a set of visual marketing assets you can actually use.


Who This Course Is For

Hi, I’m Tim – an Adobe Certified Instructor, Adobe Certified Expert, and creative designer based in London.

This course is ideal for:

  • Small business owners and entrepreneurs

  • Content creators, influencers & social media managers

  • Students & career-builders looking to add AI-powered design skills

  • Home users who want creative projects made easy

If you’re brand new to Adobe Express, you can follow along easily – I cover the interface early on. If you already know the basics, feel free to skip ahead.


Tools We’ll Use

You’ll explore powerful AI and branding tools including:

  • Adobe Firefly for text & image generation

  • ChatGPT and Gemini Flash for concept development and prompts

  • Google Labs Whisk for advanced animation from portraits

  • Adobe Express Brand Kits, video effects & voice tools

  • Auto cutout and template-based editing

Short, clear video lessons ensure rapid learning and fast results – even if you’ve never designed before.


What You Need

  • Adobe Express (free or paid version)

  • A browser or the mobile app

  • No prior design experience required


By the End of the Course

You’ll confidently create:
Branded social media campaigns
Logos, character avatars & brand graphics
Video intros and animated marketing content
Cohesive digital marketing assets ready to publish anywhere

You’ll have a complete set of project files – and new design skills you can use immediately.


Credits & Notes

title: Blender: Dive into the 3D world
description:
Ready to dive into the world of 3D? This course is your complete guide to becoming proficient in Blender, the powerful and free 3D software that's taking the industry by storm.

Why Blender?

From video games and architectural design to product visualization and animation, 3D skills are more in demand than ever. But starting out can feel overwhelming. Blender offers a single, comprehensive platform to learn everything you need. We'll start from the absolute basics, demystifying Blender's interface and core principles so you can build a strong foundation and unleash your creativity.

What You'll Learn:

Unlike CAD programs that focus on precise, mathematical designs, Blender is a mesh-based modeling tool. This means we'll be building everything using vertices, edges, and faces—the building blocks of organic shapes, characters, and artistic creations. If you've ever used other popular mesh-based programs like ZBrush, Maya, or 3ds Max, you'll feel right at home with Blender's core logic.

Throughout the course, we'll cover:

  • Modeling: Learn different techniques to create a wide range of models.

  • Sculpting: Shape and refine organic forms.

  • Animation: Bring your creations to life.

  • Shading: Master materials and textures.

  • Lighting & Rendering: Set the mood and produce stunning final images.

  • Compositing: Combine different elements to polish your scenes.

Who Is This Course For?

This course is designed for anyone who wants to learn 3D. No prior experience is needed!

  • Beginners: If you're new to 3D, this is the perfect starting point.

  • Hobbyists: Create game characters, objects for 3D printing, or digital art.

  • Aspiring Professionals: Build a solid portfolio for a career in game development, animation, or architectural visualization.

  • Blender Users: Refresh your foundational knowledge and get up to speed with the latest interface.

If you're ready to open the door to the digital world of 3D, let's get started.

title: How to Join and Win International Architecture Competitions
description:
In this course, you will learn how to navigate the world of international architecture competitions. We explore 17 major platforms where competitions are regularly posted, covering a wide range of scales, budgets, and project types—from small conceptual exercises to large urban developments. You will gain insights into each platform’s focus, strengths, and the types of competitions they host, helping you identify the opportunities that align with your skills and professional goals.We also cover essential tips for successful participation, including understanding registration requirements, competition rules, submission guidelines, presentation styles, and how to strategically select competitions to maximize your exposure and professional growth. Additionally, you will see a complete example of a competition brief analyzed step by step, helping you understand what juries look for and how to prepare a competitive entry.

title: Rey's Anatomy: 8-week Anatomy Course
description:
Rey’s Anatomy is an intensive 8-week course designed to help artists master the human figure from the inside out. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your anatomy skills, this structured program breaks down complex forms into clear, approachable lessons with a focus on artistic application.

Each week focuses on a key area of the body:

  1. Skeleton & Proportions – Build a strong foundation by understanding the body’s internal structure and ideal proportions.

  2. Legs and Feet – Learn to draw stable, dynamic lower limbs with accurate form and flow.

  3. Thighs and Gluteals – Study the muscles of the upper legs and how they influence movement and volume.

  4. Front Torso – Explore the ribcage, abdominal muscles, and overall front-plane structure.

  5. Back Torso and Shoulders – Understand the complex layering of muscles that define posture and back anatomy.

  6. Arms – Break down upper and lower arm anatomy for more confident gesture and structure.

  7. Head: Face and Neck – Focus on facial structure, features, and how the neck supports and connects the head.

  8. Wrap-Up – Last Lecture – Review key takeaways, solidify your understanding, and get tips on applying your anatomy knowledge to your own art practice.

By the end of the course, you'll have a more complete understanding of anatomy and how to apply it in your figure drawings with confidence and clarity.

Rey Bustos is a renowned artistic anatomy professor based in Altadena, California, with over three decades of experience teaching figure drawing and anatomy since 1990. He has taught at leading institutions such as ArtCenter College of Design, the Los Angeles Academy of Figurative Art, and California State University, Los Angeles, as well as for major studios like Disney and Pixar.

Rey is the author of "Rey's Anatomy: Figurative Art Lessons from the Classroom" and is known for his engaging, in-depth approach to teaching anatomy through both traditional methods and imaginative applications. His courses have helped thousands of students—from entertainment designers to fine artists—gain a solid, practical understanding of the human form.


Have a great day guys and stay tuned for upcoming updates!
