title: Elevate Your Web Design: A Course in Visual Aesthetics
description:
Have you ever wondered what separates a good website from a truly great one? The secret often lies beyond the code and resides in the deliberate application of visual design aesthetics. This comprehensive course is built to demystify the art and science behind creating beautiful, intuitive, and effective web interfaces. We will guide you on a journey from the foundational building blocks of design to the psychological principles that make a user's experience feel effortless and engaging. Whether you are a developer looking to sharpen your design eye, a new designer starting your career, or a marketer wanting to create more impactful digital assets, this course will equip you with the essential knowledge you need.

We begin by establishing a strong foundation in the core elements of design. You'll learn how to use color to communicate identity, play with value and texture to create visual interest and emphasis, and leverage shapes, forms, and lines to build organized and unified layouts. We will also dive deep into typography, ensuring you can communicate your message with clarity and purpose. Once you have mastered the "what," we will explore the "how" by mastering the principles of design. You will learn to establish a clear visual hierarchy with contrast, achieve harmony with balance and proportion, and create a seamless flow with unity and rhythm. We explore how microinteractions can add life to your designs and how simplicity can dramatically enhance usability.

Finally, to tie it all together, we unlock the power of human perception by exploring the fundamentals of Gestalt theory. You'll understand why users group similar elements, follow lines and curves with their eyes, and mentally fill in the gaps with closure. This knowledge will empower you to design more intuitive forms, improve readability with figure-ground relationships, and build perfectly balanced layouts that feel natural to the user. By the end of this course, you will be able to create websites that are not only visually stunning but are also strategically designed to guide, engage, and delight your audience.
headline: Improve User Experience by Applying the Core Principles, Visual Elements, and Psychology of Web Design

title: Complete React Native Course – From Beginner to Pro
description:
You will learn the complete React Native from basics to More Advanced concepts with real world Projects. The React Native course is designed to provide you with the knowledge and practical skills required to build high-performance mobile applications for both iOS and Android using a single codebase. React Native, developed by Facebook, has revolutionized mobile app development by combining the flexibility of JavaScript with the power of native mobile performance. This course equips you with the ability to create cross-platform applications that are efficient, scalable, and user-friendly, making it an essential skillset for modern developers.

The journey begins with an introduction to the fundamentals of React Native, where you will explore the core concepts such as components, props, state, and styling. By understanding these building blocks, You will gain the ability to design modular and reusable components that form the foundation of mobile applications. Emphasis is placed on mastering JSX syntax, navigation, and handling user interactions to create seamless experiences across platforms. You will dive deeper into advanced concepts such as hooks, context API, and state management techniques using tools like Redux. You will also learn how to connect applications with external APIs, handle asynchronous data, and implement offline functionality for a more robust user experience. Practical guidance is provided on integrating device features such as the camera, GPS, and push notifications, helping learners build apps that feel truly native.

This course is ideal for web developers looking to expand into mobile app development, you eager to enter the tech industry, or professionals who want to create their own applications. By mastering React Native, You will gain a competitive edge in the growing mobile app development market, where cross-platform efficiency and user experience are key.

title: Fusion 360 Professional: Learn from Scratch to Expert

visible_instructors.title: Gaddam Ashok
visible_instructors.name: Gaddam
visible_instructors.job_title: an Assistant Professor  at SR University, Warangal.

description:
Fusion 360 Pro: Design Smarter & Faster – Assembly and Animation is a specialized course designed to help learners move beyond basic modeling and truly master the power of assemblies and animations in Fusion 360. Assemblies are at the core of any product design process, and this course provides you with the knowledge and skills needed to confidently create, manage, and troubleshoot them. You will learn how to properly apply joints and constraints, simulate motion between components, and ensure your designs replicate real-world functionality with accuracy and precision.

The course also focuses on best practices for handling complex projects, such as organizing multi-part designs, streamlining workflows, and reducing errors during the assembly process. By learning to structure and manage assemblies efficiently, you will save time and avoid common mistakes that slow down professional design work.

In addition to assemblies, you will gain hands-on experience with Fusion 360’s powerful animation tools. From simple exploded views to advanced motion sequences, you will discover how to create animations that effectively showcase your designs. These animations are not only visually impressive but also essential for communicating design intent to clients, teams, or stakeholders in a clear and professional way.

By the end of this course, you will have the confidence to design, assemble, and animate products seamlessly in Fusion 360. Whether you are a student, hobbyist, or professional, this course will equip you with the skills to design smarter, work faster, and present your ideas more effectively.

title: The Easiest Motion Graphics Class you will Ever Take
description:
This is the easiest motion graphics class I've made so far. This beginner level class is a great introduction to Adobe After Effects. You will learn some basic animation techniques as well as some tips and tricks to get you started in motion graphics.

In this class you'll learn:

  • A general overview of the Adobe After Effects software

  • How to animate using the position, rotation, scale, and opacity properties

  • How to animate a line using a "trim path"

  • How to use the type tool

  • How to create a pre-comp

  • How to use an expression

  • How to loop and export your animation to share in the project gallery

You’ll be creating:

  • Together we will create a loading icon animation

You can complete the class project by following these steps:

  1. Follow along with my video lessons

  2. Together we will create a loading icon animation

Included in the project file is a finished version of the class. It might help in case you get stuck on one of the lessons.

What You Need:

  • Adobe After Effects

  • Adobe Media Encoder to export

To share your class project follow these steps:

  1. Export your animation in mp4 format(you will learn how to do this in the export lesson)

  2. Upload your video to a video-sharing platform such as YouTube or Vimeo. I suggest uploading your video using the "unlisted" option. That way your video will be private, but you will still be able to share it here.

  3. On the projects & resources page find the submit project button

  4. Share the link to your video

title: Nomad Sculpt Crash Course for Beginners!
description:
Nomad Sculpt is an incredible 3D sculpting application for iPad and Android tablets. If you're thinking about getting into 3D, there is no better time to get started than right now. In this beginner course we'll create a basic character to get you comfortable with 3D sculpting in Nomad.

Here is some of what we'll cover in class:

  • Basic character blocking and using primitives (basic shapes to create various parts of the sculpts)

  • Essential tools needed for basic sculpting and manipulating 3D meshes (3D meshes are just shapes or objects!)

  • Voxel remeshing, smoothing, and masking.

  • Lighting and coloring hour sculpt

  • Exporting a final render, and also exporting a turntable

3D has come a long way since a stand-alone desktop computer was the only way to create 3D art. While you can export your files to Blender or other 3D software, it's actually fun designing on an iPad or tablet with Nomad. The application does have more complicated and advanced functions, but those you will learn in time. The basics are fairly easy to learn, which makes the whole process a whole lot easier.

Not only can you recreate your 2D characters in 3D, but you can also export your sculpts as STL files for 3D printing.  This is an easy going beginners class, so no pressure, or stress - just learning and creating fun 3D art. I look forward to seeing you in class!

title: NAKAWARI Course  |  Beginner Level [Part 2 of 4] Lessons 3–4
description:
Important: This course requires the NAKAWARI Anime Learning Kit ~Beginner Level~ (sold separately).


Learn the Basics of Animation: Make Your Drawings Move and Build Motion Skills!

A professional Japanese animator teaches the core skill of “in-betweening.”

Drawing and animating are not the same.

This is your go-to guide for bringing drawings to life — ideal for beginners, animation students, and pros looking to refine their skills.

★ This is Part 2 of the 4-part NAKAWARI Course：Beginner Level

﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌＜NAKAWARI Course~Beginner Level~（All 9 Lessons）＞

●Part１★ You're viewing this part

Lesson０：Introduction

Lesson１：The Role of an In-betweener

Lesson２：In-betweening Practice

●Part２

Lesson３：Looping Animation

Lesson４：Drawn Between

●Part３

Lesson５：Timing Sheets and Timing

Lesson６：In-betweening with Acting in Mind

●Part４

Lesson７：3D In-betweening and Timing Sheets

Lesson８：Final Review for Beginners

﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌﹌

Even professional animators will be amazed!? Master the skill of "making drawings move"（in-betweening）!

"Drawing" and "making them move" are different things.
Being good at illustration or proficient in 3D CG and digital drawing tools doesn’t necessarily mean you can create animation.


  • Making your own drawings move and creating animation

  • Keyframing in 3D CG and creating animation


In order to make your drawings (or 3D models) move exactly how you envision, learning the technique of "in-betweening" (NAKAWARI) is essential.

"In-betweening" is the technique of adding additional drawings between keyframes to make the animation move smoothly.
In other words, learning "in-betweening" is learning how to "make drawings move" — it's learning animation itself.


To express the actions and movements you imagine as animation, you need to develop:


  • The rules of physics and natural phenomena

  • Drawing (drafting/sketching) skills

  • The observational skills of objects and phenomena.

In fact, even professional animators often struggle to fully understand and apply these concepts.

In this course, you'll learn these essential skills and knowledge while mastering "in-betweening" (NAKAWARI)!


Recommended for:

  • Professional animators or those already studying animation
     → Perfect for a "skills check" and further skill improvement!

  • Beginners who want to create animation but have no experience
     → This course will be the fastest route to mastering animation creation!

  • Illustrators or manga artists

    → It will help improve your drawing skills!

＜Point1＞Why Is "Drawing on Paper" Important?

● Learning the Meaning of "In-Betweening" from Traditional Animation Production

In the NAKAWARI course, you will learn various methods of in-betweening such as "tap in-betweening" and "drawing in-betweening". These tasks are often supplemented by software in digital animation, meaning you might not experience every step of the proses.

How to layer paper, which parts to trace, and which parts require you to think and draw yourself—

there are many important elements hidden within the omitted steps that highlight the significance of "in-betweening".
The NAKAWARI course covers all the necessary information for understanding animation without skipping any steps.

● Drawing Skills That Can Only Be Acquired through Analog Techniques

In the NAKAWARI course, you will learn techniques like drawing even, consistent lines while considering the wear of the pencil tip.
For animators, it is crucial to draw lines beautifully and confidently.
In an environment where you can't use "⌘Z" (undo), the skill to focus and draw each line with precision is very important for animators.
By mastering delicate tasks with your hands and fingers, you can clearly differentiate your drawing abilities and animation skills.
This course will teach you the professional skill of drawing lines that you can't acquire through digital drawing.

Whether It's Analog or Digital, 2D or 3DCG, the Basics Are the Same

Start by drawing on paper, and through that process, let's enhance both your drawing ability and animation skills.


＜Point2＞Let’s Learn About the Style of the Japanese Animation Industry!

This course is taught by KazushigeYusa who is a veteran animator from Japan.
It follows the style of Japanese animation production, making it ideal for those who want to learn about the current state of the Japanese animation industry and how animation is created in Japan.

Of course, the content of this course is also applicable to various animation production environments, including overseas productions, digital drawing, and 3D CG.

By the time you finish this course (from beginner to advanced levels), you will have acquired the skills necessary to step into the world of professional animation.
This course is highly recommended for those aiming to work in the Japanese animation industry or pursue a career in animation business.


＜Course instructor＞

Kazushige Yusa Animator/Animation Director/Technical Director

In 1978, He joined Tatsunoko Production (Currently Tatsunoko Pro).

Currently he works freelance on productions for television programs, TV commercials, and short works.

He is also very invested in training new animator talent as a university professor and vocational school instructor.

While working professionally he has participated in educational exchanges with: The United States, France, Canada, and Singapore. I have also been involved in educational initiatives throughout Japan utilizing animation as a Special Lecturer .

<Representative works>

Urusei Yatsura/Miyuki/Once Upon a Time in Japan/Touch/Ojarumaru/Nihongo de Asobo and other titles.

title: Canva AI: Create a Brand with Artificial Intelligence
description:
In this class, you’ll learn how to use Canva AI to design a complete and professional brand identity — from logo and color palette to social media visuals and branded videos.

Whether you’re a creator, entrepreneur, or small business owner, this course will show you how to turn your ideas into a cohesive, visually stunning brand — even if you’re not a designer.

You’ll follow a step-by-step process to understand branding foundations and then bring them to life using AI-powered tools inside Canva.

What You Will Learn

By the end of this class, you’ll know how to:

  • Understand the key elements that make up a strong brand identity.

  • Use Canva AI to generate design ideas, logos, and color palettes.

  • Create branded social media content that stays visually consistent.

  • Design presentations, websites, and videos that align with your brand.

  • Build your own brand kit inside Canva for faster, smarter content creation.

Why You Should Take This Class

Branding is no longer just for big companies — it’s the foundation of every successful creator or business. With Canva AI, anyone can design high-quality brand assets without needing advanced design skills or expensive software.

This class helps you save time, look professional, and stand out online, while understanding how to make your brand feel cohesive and intentional. You’ll also get hands-on with Canva’s latest AI features that automate design work — freeing you to focus on creativity and strategy.

Who This Class Is For

This class is designed for:

  • Entrepreneurs who want to create their brand identity from scratch.

  • Content creators and freelancers who want to level up their visuals.

  • Design beginners looking to master Canva’s AI tools.

    No prior design experience is needed — just curiosity and a free Canva account.

Materials / Resources

You’ll need:

  • A Canva account (free or Pro).

  • A computer or tablet to follow along.

You’ll also get:

  • Downloadable brand kit templates to customize your own branding system.

  • A final class project to design your complete brand kit using Canva AI.

title: BIM- Revit Masterclass: Complete Project Modeling+ Rendering
description:
Note: The main difference in this course compared to others is that we don’t just teach simple Revit tools or isolated modeling tricks.


Instead, you’ll go through a real project-based BIM workflow, from importing CAD drawings to complete 3D modeling, quantity takeoff, clash detection, documentation, and advanced Twinmotion renderings.

Everything is designed to simulate a real-world project environment and professional execution process.


Are you facing these challenges?

  • Struggling to model real construction projects in Revit beyond simple tutorials?

  • Want to master BIM-based workflows and handle architectural and structural coordination like a pro?

  • Looking to produce professional documentation, precise quantity takeoffs, and realistic visualizations?

  • Want to create parametric façades and interiors ready for client presentations?

If yes, this course was built exactly for you.

This Complete BIM-Revit Masterclass takes you through the entire lifecycle of a real project — from structural modeling and architectural detailing to clash detection, documentation, and advanced rendering in Twinmotion.


Headlines:

  • Full BIM Workflow in Autodesk Revit

  • Structural Modeling: Foundations, Columns, Beams, and Slabs

  • Architectural Modeling with LOD 400 Precision

  • Curtain Wall Parametric Façade Design

  • Interior Design - Kitchen & Furniture Parametric Families

  • Navisworks Clash Detection & Coordination

  • Sheeting & Documentation - Titleblocks, Details, and Legends

  • Quantity Takeoffs & Cost Estimation

  • Twinmotion Advanced Realistic Rendering & Virtual Tours

  • From CAD to Complete BIM Project Delivery



Why This Course?

Most BIM modelers can follow isolated tutorials but struggle to execute a full professional project from start to finish.

This course changes that. You’ll learn how every Revit element connects logically across structure, architecture, and visualization.

With hands-on practice, you’ll go beyond “tool knowledge” and master professional Revit thinking - the mindset of real BIM designers.


By the End of This Course

You’ll be fully capable of delivering an entire BIM-ready project, from foundation to final rendering and confidently take on real architectural modeling contracts on your own.

Whether you're an architect, engineer, or BIM designer, this course will empower you to model smarter, document faster, and present projects that truly impress.

title: Revit MEP Mechanical Room 2026: 3D Modeling to Execution

visible_instructors.title: Amir Karami • BIM
visible_instructors.name: Amir
visible_instructors.job_title: BIM Manager, BIM Modeler, Revit, Architect, MEP Modeler

description:
Note: This is not a typical Revit MEP Mechanical Room course that only explains software commands — instead, it uses real mechanical room projects to teach you professional modeling workflows for pumps, boilers, coil tanks, chillers, and fan coils, along with piping, supports, BOQ extraction, and shop drawings. The goal is to help you build real-world, execution-ready BIM models for your portfolio and job opportunities.


  • How can a complete and detailed mechanical room be modeled professionally in Revit MEP?

  • What makes the modeling of pumps, boilers, chillers, and fan coils different from simple piping design?

  • How can we use a Revit MEP model to produce accurate BOQ, shop drawings, and coordination outputs for execution?


This project-based course covers the entire mechanical room workflow — from equipment modeling and pipe routing to support detailing, quantity takeoff, and sheet setup.

Throughout the lessons, you will gain hands-on experience using Revit MEP tools applied to real HVAC and plumbing systems.

By the end of this course, you will be able to design, document, and visualize complete mechanical rooms confidently in Revit MEP.


Headlines:

⦁ Revit MEP Mechanical Room Equipment – complete understanding of pumps, boilers, and coil tanks.

⦁ Revit MEP Templates & Settings – professional setup and configuration for mechanical room projects.

⦁ Pipe Fittings and Connections in Revit MEP – high-detailed configuration of welded and galvanized piping systems.

⦁ Pump Modeling in Revit MEP – accurate placement, foundations, and pipe routing for HVAC systems.

⦁ Revit MEP Coil Tank Modeling – expert family creation and connection of hot and cold water lines.

⦁ Boiler Piping Systems in Revit MEP – complete modeling workflow from collectors to pumps and return lines.

⦁ Chillers, Fan Coils & Water Softeners – detailed modeling of piping networks in BIM projects.

⦁ Valves and Flanges in Revit MEP – expert placement and realistic detailing following BIM standards.

⦁ Supports & Expansion Lines in Revit MEP – accurate modeling and professional implementation for real projects.

⦁ BOQ and Quantity Takeoff in Revit MEP – practical extraction and scheduling of pipes and fittings.

⦁ Shop Drawings & Sheet Setup – complete documentation and presentation for construction.

⦁ Architecture & Structure Coordination in Revit MEP – detecting and resolving clashes in BIM mechanical models.


Enroll now to strengthen your BIM and Revit MEP skills through real-world mechanical room modeling.

If you have any questions during the course, feel free to ask — I provide 24/7 instructor support to help you master every concept and become job-ready faster.

description:
A simplified guide for Healthcare HVAC with a scientific material & explanation in simple English language, summarizes basics of air conditioning design in hospitals – Course is useful for Healthcare HVAC Engineers, either Design or Construction or Maintenance.

the course includes the following: ·

· Explanation of the specifications of air conditioning equipment and filters used in hospitals HVAC systems showing the difference between them and commercial systems

· Hygienic vs Clinical vs commercial AHU

· Clarification of the meaning of number of Air Changes per Hour (ACH) together with Fresh Air Changes per Hour (FACH) for different hospital rooms · Temperatures and humidity required in different hospital rooms.

· How to distribute air and what type of air outlets are required

· Room air pressurization requirements, how to implement it, and its challenges.

· Architectural considerations associated with the air conditioning system.

Course explains hospital rooms HVAC requirements for the following hospital departments & rooms: ·

· Isolation rooms for patients (infectious patient – immunocompromised patient – infectious and immunocompromised patient – Iodine Injection Patient - psychiatric patient)

· Operating Rooms (OR)·

· Surgical Site Infection and UCV Operating Rooms ·

· Clean rooms classes·

· IVF department·

· PACU Recovery Rooms·

· Intensive Care different types (ICU) – PICU – NICU – Burn ICU.

· Precautions for Ductwork Penetration for Lead-lined Rooms·

Garbage rooms · and others

title: Mastering BIM with Revit: Architecture, Structure & MEP
description:
Welcome to “Mastering BIM with Revit: Architecture, Structure & MEP”, a comprehensive hands-on course designed to take your Building Information Modeling (BIM) skills to the next level. Whether you’re an architect, structural engineer, MEP professional, or a beginner aiming to enter the field, this course equips you with practical, real-world Revit expertise.

Start by mastering Revit Family creation, designing parametric components using Extrude, Blend, Revolve, Sweep, Swept Blend, and Void Forms. Learn to connect ducts, pipes, electrical systems, and controls, preparing your models for smooth multidisciplinary collaboration.

Dive into Revit Architecture to design and document floors, ceilings, roofs, doors, windows, staircases, and furniture layouts. Apply materials, model curtain systems, mullions, and railings to create professional architectural models ready for real-world projects.

In Revit Structure, gain hands-on experience in reinforcement modeling for footings, columns, beams, slabs, and staircases, along with steel structure modeling. Learn to generate schedules, quantities, and sheets for accurate project documentation.

Finally, explore Revit MEP, covering electrical, plumbing, and fire-fighting systems. This module ensures you can model, coordinate, and document complex building services efficiently.

By the end of this course, you’ll confidently create intelligent 3D models, streamline BIM workflows, and deliver high-quality multidisciplinary projects. With step-by-step tutorials, quizzes, and practical projects, this course prepares you for real-world challenges and boosts your career in architecture, engineering, and construction.

title: Master Rendering with ArchiCAD

visible_instructors.title: Valentyn-Vladyslav Kotsarenko
visible_instructors.name: Valentyn-Vladyslav
visible_instructors.job_title: Master's in Architecture | BIM Coordinator | Educator

description:
What other possibilities does ArchiCAD offer? How can you push your BIM model to its limits for representation and graphic expression? How can you produce hand-drawn, basic, daytime, nighttime, or hybrid-style graphics? How can you create renderings such as plan views, isometric cutouts, scale models, analytical models, or exploded representations? How can you use Artificial Intelligence (AI) to apply post-production to your renders? How can you use Artificial Intelligence (AI) to generate design proposals from primitive geometries? These—and many more—are some of the questions I will answer for you in this intermediate level guide on ArchiCAD.


Building Information Modeling (BIM) stands out as a methodology that revolutionizes the architecture, engineering, construction and operation (AECO) sector, and ArchiCAD -a solution developed by Graphisoft since 1982- is one of the various tools that enables this way of working, by centralizing information in a BIM database ArchiCAD allows for greater project quality and productivity in less time compared to the 2D CAD workflow.


Welcome! I'm Valentyn-Vladyslav Kotsarenko, an architect with a Master's degree and experience as a BIM Coordinator. As an advanced ArchiCAD user certified by Graphisoft Mexico, I've spent over a decade collaborating with professionals in implementing BIM solutions. Additionally, I've trained numerous universities, companies, and individuals in various BIM tools, aiming to optimize workflows and production processes. Now, I'm here to guide you through this journey.


This course represents a complementary step in a series of structured training programs; If you already know the basics of developing an architectural project with ArchiCAD and wish to further enhance your skills with the handling of more powerful tools, workflows, and complex solutions for your project, then this training is for you.


Throughout this training:


  • Learn the theoretical foundations and principles of rendering, visual composition, and graphic expression.

  • Master tools for framing and composing a scene in ArchiCAD.

  • Explore efficient methods for managing and assigning materials and textures to your BIM model.

  • Learn how to import, organize, and manage objects to enhance your scene composition.

  • Understand how the Sketch and Basic rendering engines operate.

  • Learn how to configure and optimize the Cineware by MAXON rendering engine.

  • Master the setup of channels and effects to create realistic surfaces.

  • Explore tools and techniques for artificial lighting in ArchiCAD.

  • Learn how to produce plan, section, isometric, hybrid, model, and analytical render types.

  • Apply Artificial Intelligence (AI) for the post-production of final renders.

  • Use Artificial Intelligence (AI) for the generation of design proposals from scratch.

And more.


BIM has transformed workflows worldwide, and today, you too can achieve it! Enroll now!
headline: Unlock the full potential of professional rendering and visualization with ArchiCAD!

title: Complete WordPress Masterclass 2025 : Learn WordPress
description:
Unlock the Power of WordPress!


Embark on an exciting journey into the world of WordPress with this comprehensive course designed for beginners and aspiring webmasters. Whether you're looking to create a personal blog, a business website, or a fully functional eCommerce store, this WordPress course will equip you with the knowledge and skills to succeed in the digital landscape.


In this masterclass, you'll learn about web hosting and domains. Discover how to choose the right web hosting provider for your WordPress site and register a domain name that reflects your brand. You'll also gain hands-on experience installing WordPress both locally for testing and on a live web host for public access.


Next, you'll navigate the WordPress dashboard. Familiarize yourself with the dashboard layout and functionalities, and learn how to configure vital settings for your site, including permalinks, privacy options, and reading settings to enhance user experience. Additionally, you'll discover how to install and manage essential plugins for added functionality and choose themes that align with your WordPress site's vision. Utilize page builders like Elementor for customizable designs.


As you move into Designing Your WordPress Website, you'll understand the fundamentals of web design, including color theory, typography, and layout basics. You'll learn to create stunning hero sections, multi-column layouts, and interactive features that engage visitors on your WordPress site. Utilize tools like Canva to design custom graphics and images that enhance your site’s visual appeal, and implement blocks and templates to streamline your design process.


You'll master the art of adding and editing pages and posts with a focus on SEO-friendly content. Learn how to personalize your WordPress site’s headers and footers for better branding and navigation. You'll also implement contact forms for user engagement and ensure your WordPress site is mobile-responsive, catering to users on all devices.


When it comes to Building an eCommerce Store with WooCommerce, you'll learn how to install and set up WooCommerce to transform your WordPress site into a powerful online store. Discover how to add products, categorize them, set prices, and manage inventory effectively. You'll also set up payment gateways for secure transactions, manage shipping options, and create promotional coupons to boost sales on your WordPress store.


The course also covers Search Engine Optimization for WordPress (SEO). You'll understand the basics of SEO and why it’s crucial for increasing visibility and driving traffic to your site. Learn to install and configure SEO plugin (RankMath) to optimize your content for search engines. Additionally, connect your WordPress site to Google Search Console to monitor performance, submit sitemaps, and optimize for better rankings.


In terms of Security and Maintenance of Your WordPress Site, you'll learn essential security measures to protect your site, including using strong passwords, keeping plugins updated, and performing regular backups. Discover how to install security plugin (Wordfence) to safeguard your site from threats and vulnerabilities, and implement maintenance routines to ensure your WordPress site runs smoothly.


This course is ideal for beginners, small business owners, bloggers, content creators, and anyone eager to harness the power of WordPress and WooCommerce. No prior technical knowledge is required—just a willingness to learn and explore!


By the end of this course, you'll possess the tools and knowledge to create, design, and optimize a professional WordPress site tailored to your unique needs and goals. Join us today and start building your online presence with confidence!

title: Ultimate Weapon Tutorial for Portfolio
description:
Are you looking to create a high-quality 3D weapon for your portfolio? Then this tutorial is for you!


Hi, I’m Laurentiu, a Senior 3D Artist with 14+ years in the game industry, including work on titles like Call of Duty and Apex Legends. After years of being asked to share my process, I’ve finally created a tutorial designed specifically for artists who want to create stunning, portfolio-ready 3D weapons.


Complete Edition Content:

  • 39 1440p .mp4 Video Files

  • 2 1080p .mp4 Video Files

  • Over 35 hours fully narrated in english

  • Rough weapon blockout and picatinny rail

  • Substance Painter File

  • Pure ref File


What You’ll Learn:

This fully narrated, 6-chapter tutorial walks you through the entire pipeline, from high poly to final render.

  • High-poly modeling using Plasticity and ZBrush ( starting from a blockout mesh )

  • Low-poly modeling using PIXYZ and 3ds max for some optimization

  • UV-Unwrap using 3ds max and RizomUv

  • Baking using Marmoset Toolbag

  • Texturing using Substance Painter ( Breakdown of the Substance Painter file with explanation )

  • Rendering using Marmoset Toolbag


Every chapter reflects real industry techniques I use in professional environments. Whether you're looking to polish your portfolio, strengthen your hard-surface skills, or learn how to texture realistic weapons and make beautiful renders, this tutorial will get you there.

Designed for intermediate to advanced artists, but clear and structured enough for beginners who want to grow fast.

If you have any questions don't hesitate to ask.

Welcome to "3ds Max – Complete Guide to 3D Modeling & Rendering," a hands-on course designed to help beginners and aspiring designers master the powerful features of Autodesk 3ds Max. Starting with basic primitives and snap tools, you’ll progress to real-world modeling projects like creating a staircase, and CNC jali patterns. title: MATLAB Masterclass
description:
course teaches mechanical engineers to use MATLAB for tasks like data analysis, simulation, and algorithm development. These courses cover MATLAB basics and apply them to mechanical engineering problems, including modeling systems, performing calculations, and automating tasks with scripting.

designed to improve readers' programming skills and ability to use MATLAB to solve mechanical engineering problems.

Many examples are presented to demonstrate the application of MATLAB to the analysis of problems in control systems, basic engineering mechanics, statics and dynamics, mechanical vibrations, electrical circuits, and numerical methods.

provide analytical, numerical, and applied tools for studying and designing various systems in mechanical and aerospace engineering. Their practical workflows for solving fundamental engineering problems and extensive adoption in the industry enable academics to translate fundamental engineering problem-solving skills into applied engineering solutions for complex systems.

Mechanical engineers employ a comprehensive range of modeling approaches, considering factors such as reliance on fundamental physical principles, available system behavior data, and the required fidelity of the models.

They use MATLAB and Simulink to develop models based on first principles, leveraging advanced solvers suitable for continuous, discrete, and event-driven systems. These products also offer extended capabilities to integrate models and components from multiple sources.

Engineers can use data-driven methodologies for system identification, statistical analysis, and machine learning or deep learning applications.

title: The 7-Second Game USP: Hook Players Instantly | Speedrun

visible_instructors.title: Patrick Rose
visible_instructors.name: Patrick
visible_instructors.job_title: Consultant - Product Strategy, Game Design & User Psychology

description:
You only get seven seconds to make players care - but seven seconds is all you need if your game has a powerful USP.

In this speedrun of a course we won't waste any time: in less than 60 minutes you’ll learn how to craft a Unique Selling Proposition (USP) that instantly communicates what makes your game special. Whether you’re in the concept phase or preparing your pitch, you’ll gain the tools to define your game’s core identity clearly, so players, publishers, and investors get it at first sight.

Taught by Patrick Rose, game strategy consultant, games researcher, product expert and creator of The Art of Irresistible Game Design, this course condenses years of AAA and indie game experience into a structured, actionable format. You’ll explore how player psychology, Self-Determination Theory, and emotional design can turn your game into something people not only play, but feel.

Through real examples from games like Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Fortnite, Disco Elysium, and Portal, you’ll uncover the 9 core USP categories, mechanics, art style, theme, motivation, accessibility, and more, and learn how to position your project for success.

By the end, you’ll have:

  • A one-sentence USP that defines your game’s unique value.

  • A clear understanding of what makes players care and remember your title.

  • A tested framework to make your marketing, pitch, and game design speak one unified message.

This course is perfect for game designers, producers, creative leads, indie developers, and marketers who want to stand out in an overcrowded market and design games that capture hearts — in just seven seconds.
headline: Learn to define your game’s Unique Selling Proposition and master the 7-second hook that makes players instantly care.
requirements_data: A genuine passion for games. This course is made for people who love games, play them actively, and understand what makes certain titles stand out and feel unforgettable.
Familiarity with several games or genres. You don’t need professional experience, but having a broad knowledge of games helps you connect examples and identify powerful USPs.

An open, forward-thinking mindset. This course is for creative professionals who want to use psychological and innovative design techniques to create deeper player engagement and fresh, standout experiences.
Best suited for the concept phase. The tools and frameworks are especially valuable when shaping or pitching a new game idea, ensuring it’s unique and compelling from the very start.

Also useful in later project phases. The same methods can enhance your marketing materials, demo build and trailers, sharpen your pitch to investors or publishers, and refine the emotional clarity of your existing design.
No programming or technical experience required. You’ll learn practical creative and psychological methods that apply to any game project, regardless of your technical background.
what_you_will_learn_data: Define and craft a powerful Unique Selling Proposition (USP) that instantly captures player attention and communicates your game’s identity.
Understand the psychology behind why players care using Self-Determination Theory (Competence, Autonomy, Relatedness) to shape engagement.
Identify your game’s USP category among nine proven types, from mechanics and art style to emotional design and accessibility.
Write a clear, emotional one-sentence hook for your game that resonates with players, publishers, and investors in under seven seconds.
Analyze world-famous games to understand how their USPs shaped marketing, player emotion, and long-term success.
Test and validate your USP using the 7-second attention framework to see if players instantly understand and care.
Use your USP to improve your trailer, pitch deck, or store page, ensuring consistent, emotionally engaging communication.

title: Advanced Creo Training Course | Master 3D CAD Design Skills
description:
The Advanced Creo Training Course is designed to help engineers, designers, and CAD professionals elevate their skills in 3D product design and modeling. This comprehensive program goes beyond the basics, focusing on advanced features and techniques that enable you to create precise, efficient, and industry-standard designs with confidence.

Throughout the course, you will explore advanced part and assembly modeling, parametric controls, and design automation. You will gain hands-on experience with surface modeling, sheet metal design, and the creation of complex geometries that are essential in real-world product development. The training also covers simulation and analysis tools in Creo, equipping you with the ability to validate designs, perform motion and structural analysis, and optimize overall product performance with accuracy.

In addition, you will learn how to streamline design workflows, improve productivity, and manage large-scale assemblies more effectively. By integrating best practices into your work, you will enhance your problem-solving skills and reduce design errors significantly.

By the end of this course, you will not only master advanced CAD skills but also develop a strong understanding of best practices for design workflows, assembly management, and documentation. Whether you aim to boost your career, improve productivity, or enhance your technical expertise, this course provides the knowledge and confidence to tackle challenging design projects.

Take the next step in your professional journey and become an expert in 3D CAD with Creo today.
headline: Enhance your expertise with advanced modeling, simulation, and design automation techniques in Creo.
requirements_data: Basic Knowledge of Creo – Familiarity with core Creo tools like part modeling, assemblies, and drawings.
Fundamental CAD Skills – Understanding of general 3D CAD concepts and design workflows.
Engineering or Technical Background – A background in mechanical, design, or related fields (preferred but not mandatory).
Computer with Creo Installed – Access to a computer with a working Creo setup for hands-on practice.
what_you_will_learn_data: Advanced 3D Modeling & Assemblies – Create complex parts, multi-body designs, and manage large assemblies efficiently.
Surface & Sheet Metal Design – Build intricate surfaces and advanced sheet metal components for real-world applications.
Simulation & Analysis Tools – Perform motion studies, mechanism design, and structural analysis within Creo.
Productivity & Automation Skills – Use parametric design, family tables, mapkeys, and customization to speed up design work.
target_audiences: Mechanical and Design Engineers looking to upgrade their 3D CAD design skills.
Engineering Students and Graduates who want to build industry-ready Creo expertise.
CAD Designers and Draftsmen aiming to advance from basic to complex Creo projects.

description:
Hey Everyone,

Unlock your creative potential and master one of the most powerful design tools in the world with this comprehensive Learn Adobe Illustrator from Scratch: Design Like a Pro course. Whether you’re a complete beginner or looking to refine your digital illustration skills, this course will take you step by step through the fundamentals of Illustrator and guide you toward creating professional level vector artwork, logos, icons, and more.


In this course, you’ll start from the very basics — understanding the Illustrator workspace, learning how to use essential tools, and navigating through panels, layers, and shapes. You’ll quickly gain confidence in drawing, coloring, and transforming objects while learning how to manage paths, strokes, and fills. Each lesson is carefully designed to help you build a solid foundation and develop a designer’s mindset, even if you’ve never used Illustrator before.


As you progress, you’ll explore more advanced techniques such as typography design, logo creation, and vector illustration. You’ll also learn how to use gradients, brushes, patterns, and effects to bring your designs to life with depth and personality. Practical exercises and real world projects will help you apply your new skills, from designing marketing materials to creating artwork suitable for print and digital platforms.


This course doesn’t just teach you how to use Adobe Illustrator — it teaches you how to think like a designer. You’ll learn the principles of composition, color theory, and visual balance, giving you the creative edge to make your designs stand out. By the end of the course, you’ll be able to confidently create professional quality graphics and illustrations ready for clients, portfolios, or personal projects.


Whether you’re an aspiring graphic designer, digital artist, content creator, or marketing professional, this course will equip you with the skills you need to produce polished, high quality visuals. No prior experience is required — just your creativity and willingness to learn.

title: The Ultimate Pixel Art Aseprite Animation Bootcamp
description:
Hi, I am LIPAI. I am an Indie Game Dev and also a digital artiest who made all the game assets myself.

Pixel art animation might look simple, but behind every bouncing ball or squishy slime is the foundation of great animation principles. In this bootcamp, you’ll learn the basic Aseprite animation and build real projects.

We’ll start with the basics—creating your canvas, adding frames, and using onion skin to see your animation flow. Then you’ll practice the timeless bouncing ball project, where you’ll understand speed, acceleration, squash, and stretch—fundamentals that make movement feel alive.

Next, we’ll bring it to life with a full slime animation project. You’ll learn how to design, draw, and animate a cute slime character that falls, bounces, and interacts with its background. We’ll even explore how AI can help speed up parts of your workflow.

Finally, we’ll move beyond sketching: you’ll discover how to export your work as GIFs, widescreen demos, and sprite sheets that are fully game-ready. Whether you’re making animations to share online, improve your art portfolio, or build assets for your indie games, this course gives you the tools to succeed.

By the end of this bootcamp, you’ll have a completed animation project, a strong grasp of the principles of animation, and the confidence to keep creating your own pixel art worlds!
headline: Learn Aseprite step-by-step: pixel art animation, squash & stretch, slime projects, GIFs, sprite sheets, and game-ready

title: Hyena groom techniques in Houdini
description:
In this course, you'll learn how to create realistic fur for creatures in VFX, developing a robust and efficient production workflow with Houdini, Solaris Karma, Mari and Zbrush


We'll begin by studying the basics of grooming in Houdini, where we'll explore how to generate and control fur according to its different lengths and areas on the creature's body: short hair, long hair, and tail. Each section of the character requires a specific approach, and I'll show you step-by-step techniques that will allow you to achieve detailed and professional results.


We'll then work on integrating Solaris with Karma, configuring materials, shaders, and render parameters to ensure a photorealistic finish. You'll learn how to prepare your scene for lighting and rendering in an orderly manner, optimizing your production workflow.


We'll also explore the creation of textures in Mari, essential for adding realism and visual richness to your project. You'll see how to generate maps that add depth as a displacement maps and variation to the fur, achieving a believable, cinematic-quality final result.


By the end of the course, you'll have a complete and practical pipeline for creating fur creatures, applicable to both personal projects and film, series, and advertising productions and videogames and more

description:
Character Art School: Complete Character Design

Master the Art of Character Drawing and Design with Professional Composition Techniques

Do you want to take your character drawing from average to extraordinary? Whether you’re a complete beginner or a professional artist looking to refine your skills, Character Art School: Complete Character Design is the ultimate course for mastering the principles of highly engaging character art. This course teaches you not just how to draw characters better, but how to design them with visual purpose, clarity, and the kind of powerful compositional theory that makes your artwork unforgettable.

Why This Course is Different

Most character drawing courses focus on surface-level tips—drawing anatomy, learning proportions, or replicating references. While those are important, they often leave artists stuck in mediocrity. What truly separates great character artists from average ones is their grasp of composition—the hidden structure behind compelling drawings and illustrations.

In Character Art School: Complete Character Design, you’ll learn how to build character compositions and design from the ground, up using easy to learn high-level compositional theory. This isn’t about copying or rote learning; it’s about understanding the structure of art itself and applying it to your character designs, so that they stand out with clarity, style, and impact.

What You’ll Learn Inside the Course

This course takes you step by step through the complete process of character compositional design, giving you tools you can use immediately in your own art. Topics include:

  • The Advanced Structure of Art – Learn the advanced frameworks that underpin all great character designs, giving your drawings stronger balance, flow, and appeal.

  • Image Sourcing & Inspiration – Discover how to effectively gather, analyze, and use references to fuel your creativity instead of limiting it.

  • Granular Line Composition – Master the subtle art of line modulation, rhythm, and flow to create character illustrations with a magical energy and personality.

  • Shape Composition & Proportions – Understand how shapes define the foundation of your characters, and how proportion choices change the mood, style, and readability of your designs.

  • Layering Techniques & Compositional Tools – Apply advanced methods to build complexity into your drawings while keeping them clean and cohesive. Learn the foundational compositional techniques that truly enable breathtaking and highly engaging character art.

By the end of the course, you’ll have a professional toolkit for designing characters that not only look great, but also communicate ideas, emotions, and stories extremely effectively.

Who Is This Course For?

This course was designed with artists of all levels in mind:

  • Beginners: If you’re new to drawing, you’ll find the structured, step-by-step lessons approachable and easy to follow, giving you a rock-solid foundation.

  • Intermediate Artists: If you’ve been drawing for a while but feel your characters lack polish or power, this course will show you exactly what’s missing and how to fix it.

  • Professionals: Even working illustrators and concept artists can refine their craft by mastering compositional tools that most self-taught artists overlook.

No matter where you’re starting, this course will meet you where you are and push your skills to the next level.

Why Composition Matters in Character Design

Great character drawing is not just about technical skill—it’s about making the viewer feel something. Composition is the invisible force that guides the eye, creates emotion, and ensures your character designs leave a lasting impression.

Without understanding composition, even technically solid drawings can look flat or uninspired. With it, however, your characters will have presence, clarity, and depth. This course gives you the same design principles used by top illustrators, animators, and game artists around the world, so you can bring your own characters to life in a way that captures attention and tells a story.

How This Course Will Transform Your Art

By enrolling in Character Art School: Complete Character Design, you’ll:

  • Learn how to design characters that look professional, highly engaging and market-ready.

  • Develop a deep understanding of advanced art structure so your drawings always feel balanced and powerful.

  • Gain confidence in using references and inspirations without becoming trapped by them.

  • Create characters with dynamic shapes, proportions, and linework that communicate style and personality effortlessly.

  • Break out of artistic plateaus and finally see measurable improvement in your drawing ability.

Many artists who complete this course describe it as a radical turning point in their artistic journey. Whether your dream is to work in comics, video games, animation, or simply to create characters you love to your highest potential, this course gives you the tools to get there.

Why Students Choose This Course

  • Comprehensive Curriculum – Covers everything from beginner fundamentals to advanced compositional techniques.

  • Practical, Hands-On Learning – You won’t just watch; you’ll apply each concept with guided exercises and assignments.

  • Designed for All Levels – Whether you’re holding a pencil for the first time or refining your portfolio, you’ll benefit from the course structure.

  • Proven Results – Thousands of artists have improved their character art through compositional mastery, and now it’s your turn.

Enroll Today and Transform Your Character Art

Don’t waste years stuck in the same cycle of frustration and slow progress. With the right instruction, you can make leaps in your artistic ability in a matter of weeks.

Character Art School: Complete Character Design is your shortcut to becoming the character artist you’ve always wanted to be. You’ll gain a level of insight and practical skill that most artists never reach—skills that will set you apart in any creative field.

Start designing incredible characters today. Enroll now and unlock the power of composition-driven character art.

title: Draw Your Own US Patent Drawings Like The Pros
description:
Overview

The online patent drawing course "Draw Your Own US Patent Drawings Like the Pros" is a specialized program designed to teach inventors, innovators, hobbyists and all adults who wants to learn to draw with the CAD the essential skills required to create vector-based patent drawings. The online patent drawing course using ProgeCAD and AutoCAD typically covers the fundamentals of both patent illustration standards and CAD software, making it suitable for beginners including those who just want to convert their raster images into vector line drawings. The course shows the similarities between ProgeCAD and AutoCAD drawing software, giving students the flexibility to try both drawing tools.

Key topics include understanding the requirements for patent drawings, mastering line types, drawing tools, and modification tools to give you accurate 2D line drawing. The course also guides users through the ProgeCAD and AutoCAD interface, providing step-by-step instructions on using drawing tools and modification tools to insert and trace an image in CAD.


Course Content:

The course is divided into three sections with 20 Lessons.

Section 1: Understanding Patent Illustrations - A Beginner's Guide

• Introduction to Utility and Design Patent Drawing

• Introduction to ProgeCAD and AutoCAD for Patent Drawings

• Mastering ProgeCAD and AutoCAD Workspace for Patent Drawings

• Mastering Basic Drawing Tools in Patent Drawings Using ProgeCAD and AutoCAD

• Mastering Basic Modification Tool for Patent Drawing Using ProgeCAD and AutoCAD

• Learn to Prepare Your Patent Drawing Images for Tracing in ProgeCAD or AutoCAD

• Learn to Insert Your Patent Drawing Images in ProgeCAD and AutoCAD for Tracing

Section 2: Learn To Trace Your Patent Drawings Using ProgeCAD and AutoCAD

• Tracing Line Images in Patent Drawings Using ProgeCAD and AutoCAD

• Continuing Tracing Line Images in Patent Drawing

• Tracing Solid Shapes in Patent Drawing using ProgeCAD and AutoCAD

• Tracing Orthogonal Shapes in Patent Drawing using ProgeCAD and AutoCAD

• Continue Tracing Orthogonal Shapes in Patent Drawing using ProgeCAD and AutoCAD

• Tracing Patent Drawing Images in ProgeCAD and AutoCAD using Arc Tool

• Preparing Patent Drawings Exploded Views with AutoCAD and ProgeCAD

• Tracing Patent Drawing Sectional Views using ProgeCAD and AutoCAD

Section 3: Tracing Complex Patent Drawings Shapes Using ProgeCAD and AutoCAD

• Tracing Complex Color Images into Patent Drawings Using ProgeCAD and AutoCAD

• Drawing Complex Patent Drawing Shapes - Continue

• Learn to Trace Complex Images in AutoCAD and ProgeCAD - The Finished Lines


Benefit for Hobbyists

Many hobbyists wants to learn to draw their products. The course will help them learn how to draw using CAD software such as ProgeCAD and AutoCAD

Students will be able to trace images of themselves and of others just for the fun of it.


Benefits for Inventors

· Cost Savings: Learning to create your own patent drawings can reduce or eliminate the need to hire a professional illustrator, saving inventors money during the patent application process.

· Faster Application Preparation: By mastering drawing skills, inventors can quickly produce and revise drawings, allowing for faster submission and response times when working with patent offices.

· Improved Patent Quality: Accurate and compliant drawings help ensure that the invention is properly understood and protected, reducing the risk of office actions or rejections based on inadequate illustrations.

· Enhanced Communication: High-quality drawings make it easier to explain complex ideas to patent examiners, attorneys, investors, and potential licensees.

· Greater Control: Inventors maintain control over the visual presentation of their inventions, ensuring that the technical details are depicted precisely as intended.

Looking Ahead

We will continue to add lessons to the course that will cover many other areas of patent drawings including various techniques used by professional patent Illustrators around the world.

title: Getting Started With Animation In Blender (ENTRY LEVEL)
description:
This course is designed to help you get started with animation in Blender through easy and practical projects. You will begin with the basics of keyframing and learn how to use the timeline, dope sheet, and animation view. A simple collision exercise will make it easier to understand how keyframes work and how objects move smoothly over time.
This course is must for anyone interested in building a strong foundation before learning the 12 Principles of Animation.

Next, you will explore the Graph Editor and create the classic bouncing ball animation. In this project, you will practice important animation principles such as squash and stretch. You will also learn how to make your animation smoother with easing, null objects, modifiers, and drivers. These tools will help you build stronger control over your animations and make them look more natural and polished.

After that, you will move into procedural animation by creating a turret system. In this exercise, you will see how objects can move without using keyframes. You will also add simple rigging, animation modifiers, and a basic particle system to bring more variety, creativity, and realism.

Finally, you will combine all the skills you learned in a cinematic project. By building a jet sequence, you will practice creating animations that feel dynamic, exciting, and professional.

title: Animated Explainer Videos by PowToon, Animaker, Vyond and AI

visible_instructors.title: Dr. Mohammed Majeed
visible_instructors.name: Dr. Mohammed
visible_instructors.job_title: Managing Director of 360ProTek and Principal Lecturer

description:
Animated Explainer Videos by PowToon, Animaker, Vyond and AI

This course contains the use of artificial intelligence.

In a world where attention spans are shrinking and digital communication dominates every platform, the ability to create short, visually engaging, and emotionally impactful explainer videos is no longer a luxury — it’s a necessity.

Whether you’re an educator seeking to simplify complex lessons, a marketer trying to showcase a product, a business owner building a brand, or a creative professional eager to expand your toolkit, this course is your launchpad into the dynamic world of animated storytelling powered by AI and the three most user-friendly animation platforms: PowToon, Animaker, and Vyond.

But what truly sets this course apart is not just the software we teach — it’s how we teach it, and what it empowers you to become.

Why This Course Exists

Most people are overwhelmed by the idea of video creation. They believe it’s expensive, time-consuming, or requires years of design experience. Others have tried free tools but were left frustrated by limitations, confused interfaces, or generic results that don’t truly reflect their message.

This course was born from those frustrations — and carefully designed to solve them.

We offer a structured, clear, and professional approach to animation creation using tools that are both powerful and approachable. Combined with today’s most advanced AI platforms, you will learn how to ideate, script, design, animate, narrate, and publish videos that speak with clarity and creativity.

Our approach doesn’t teach you how to press buttons. It teaches you how to think visually, how to tell stories that matter, and how to use automation smartly — saving time without sacrificing quality.

What Will You Learn?

You’ll begin by understanding the anatomy of an effective explainer video — the emotional arc, visual pacing, and clarity of structure. Then you’ll move into hands-on training with each platform:

  • PowToon: Ideal for educational and business-friendly explainers; we’ll explore smart templates, AI-generated scenes, and customizable timelines.

  • Animaker: A powerful browser-based tool for detailed scene design and lip-sync animation; you’ll learn how to craft characters and add energy with SmartMove.

  • Vyond: A professional-grade platform used by corporations and educators worldwide; you’ll create multi-scene stories with character movement, camera panning, and dynamic transitions.

You’ll also dive into modern AI tools such as:

  • ChatGPT for generating clear, structured scripts

  • Runway and Pika for converting prompts into animated elements

  • Leonardo and Hedra for designing visual assets

  • Veo 3 for turning text into video in seconds

And finally, you’ll compare the three platforms side-by-side to understand where each excels — so you can choose the best tool for each future project.

Course Tools and Workflow

Many learners hesitate to start video creation because of assumptions: “It’s too expensive,” “I need a team,” or “I don’t have the software.” We remove all those barriers.

All the tools used in this course are accessible via the cloud, and most offer free versions or generous trials. You can complete every project in this course using only your laptop and a web browser — no complex installations, no prior experience.

Even more, we show you how to combine tools:

  • Use ChatGPT to write your video script

  • Paste that script into PowToon or Vyond

  • Use AI voice generators for narration

  • Add subtitles and sync with lip movement

  • Animate transitions, characters, and props

  • Export to video or presentation format for use in classrooms, meetings, social media, or training platforms

Each workflow is built to be efficient, repeatable, and professional — enabling you to produce real, publishable content even before you finish the course.

What Can You Do After This Course?

By the time you finish, you will have produced several complete videos — real content, not practice files. You’ll have the ability to:

  • Teach with clarity and visual engagement

  • Promote a service or product visually

  • Explain complex topics using characters and motion

  • Train teams with internal video modules

  • Pitch ideas and captivate investors or clients

  • Grow your YouTube channel, website, or online presence

This is not a “watch and forget” course. It’s a practical, project-driven journey that leaves you with skills that last and content you can use immediately.

Who Is This Course For?

This course welcomes learners from all industries and backgrounds, including:

  • Teachers who want to upgrade their lesson plans with visual storytelling

  • Small business owners and marketers creating explainer ads or product walkthroughs

  • Content creators producing tutorials or video essays

  • Corporate trainers building onboarding and eLearning content

  • Students or job seekers who want to add animation to their skillset

  • Non-designers who want to animate ideas with minimal learning curve

No design experience? No problem. We guide you from zero to hero with clear instructions and insider tips.

What Makes This Course Unique?

  1. Covers Three Platforms Side-by-Side
    Instead of choosing only one animation tool, we walk you through PowToon, Animaker, and Vyond. You’ll understand the strengths of each and how to pick the right one for your project — whether it’s speed, precision, or style you need.

  2. Built Around Real Projects
    Each module ends with a video you’ll build from scratch. By the end of the course, you’ll have a portfolio of projects — ready to share with clients, students, or employers.

  3. Smart Use of AI
    We don’t just mention AI. We use it as a co-creator in your workflow. From scripting to design and video automation, AI is your creative assistant — speeding up your process without compromising creativity.

  4. Taught by Industry Practitioners
    Your instructors are not just software users — they are experienced educators, engineers, and animation creators who apply these tools in real-world contexts.

  5. Focus on Workflow, Not Just Tools
    You’ll learn how to think like a motion designer: how to structure scenes, pace animations, direct the viewer’s eye, and deliver a story with impact — not just how to use features.

What’s Inside the Course?

The course includes:

  • Video lectures with screen recordings, narration, and guided demonstrations

  • Downloadable resources: script templates, AI prompts, storyboards

  • Animation planning sheets and character builder worksheets

  • Capstone project: a complete animated explainer video from concept to final render

  • Certificate of Completion

  • Q&A access to your instructor

How Will This Help You Professionally?

Today, video content is one of the most in-demand communication formats — from social media to corporate training. If you can produce clean, clear animated videos:

  • You can add value to your workplace

  • You can create content for clients

  • You can grow your freelance offerings

  • You can attract audiences on YouTube, LinkedIn, or TikTok

  • You can make ideas understandable, memorable, and repeatable

In short, you become a modern communicator — capable of standing out in any industry.

Final Words: Why You Should Enrol

This course isn’t just about tools. It’s about unlocking the ability to bring ideas to life through animation — even if you’re not an artist or video editor.

It’s about saving time with AI, gaining confidence through clarity, and turning every message you have into a story people remember.

If you’ve ever wanted to create videos that teach, explain, inspire, or promote — this is the course that will show you how.

Let your message move. Let your ideas animate. Let’s get started.

title: Black pen drawing and painting from beginner to advanced
description:
آیا تا به حال خواسته‌اید که ویژگی‌های صورت را به شیوه‌ای زیبا و واقع‌گرایانه که واقعاً به آنها جان می‌بخشد، ترسیم کنید؟ این دوره دقیقاً برای شما طراحی شده است. در این دوره گام به گام طراحی پرتره، اصول اساسی طراحی ویژگی‌های صورت را یاد خواهید گرفت و به تدریج به تکنیک‌های پیچیده‌تر، از جمله سایه‌زنی، بافت و جزئیات واقع‌گرایانه، خواهید رسید. در پایان دوره، قادر خواهید بود هر چهره‌ای را با اعتماد به نفس و مهارت ترسیم کنید.

ما با معرفی ابزارهای ضروری، انتخاب کاغذ و انواع مختلف مداد مورد نیاز شما شروع خواهیم کرد. شما کار با خط، کنترل فشار دست و نحوه ایجاد تناسبات دقیق را تمرین خواهید کرد. سپس، به دنیای جذاب سایه‌زنی خواهیم رفت - از گرادیان‌های نرم و روان گرفته تا کنتراست‌های قوی که به نقاشی‌های شما عمق و بُعد می‌دهند. همچنین تکنیک‌های ترکیبی برای ایجاد بافت پوست، مو و جزئیات لباس واقع‌گرایانه را خواهید آموخت.

این دوره شامل تمرین‌های عملی، تکالیف گام به گام و پروژه‌های عملی واقعی است تا مطمئن شوید آنچه را که یاد می‌گیرید فوراً به کار می‌برید. حتی اگر قبلاً هرگز نقاشی نکشیده‌اید، از سطح کاملاً مبتدی تا درک پیشرفته از طراحی پرتره هدایت خواهید شد.

در پایان دوره، شما قادر خواهید بود با اطمینان پرتره‌های کاملی بکشید، سایه‌زنی سیاه و سفید واقع‌گرایانه را تمرین کنید و آثار هنری آماده برای اشتراک‌گذاری در رسانه‌های اجتماعی یا حتی استفاده به عنوان بخشی از نمونه کارهای آموزشی خود خلق کنید.

اگر آماده‌اید تا هنر طراحی پرتره را کشف کنید و مهارت‌های خود را به سطح بالاتری ببرید، همین حالا ثبت نام کنید و این سفر خلاقانه را با من آغاز کنید!

title: Nomad Sculpt: Solid Foundations
description:
Nomad Sculpt: Solid Foundations — the friendliest way to go from “totally bewildered” to “I can actually sculpt this.”

If 3D sculpting has ever made you feel lost, intimidated, or one crash away from giving up, you’re in the right place. This beginner-first course is designed to remove the panic, clear the jargon, and give you a calm, repeatable workflow you can trust. No gatekeeping. No “you should already know this.” Just you, and a clear path from blob to believable forms.

I’m an experienced video instructor with 35+ years as an illustrator/designer. I already have top-rated Procreate courses on the iPad, and I’ve taught thousands of creatives who swore they “weren’t 3D people.” Spoiler: they were. If you’ve ever enjoyed painting or sketching in Procreate, you already have the instincts for Nomad Sculpt- and that’s what this course is: a gentle, structured start that builds genuine confidence.

What makes this course different?

  • Workflow based, not just explaining tools. You won’t be dumped into a sea of buttons. We’ll establish simple, dependable workflows  that you can use for everything you make.

  • Learn by building, not just watching. Instead of tool lectures, you’ll create beginner friendly models step-by-step that turn concepts into muscle memory.

  • Beginner-safe pacing. We start with the four tools you’ll use most (Clay, Move, Flatten, Crease), plus Smooth, symmetry basics, and navigation. As your confidence grows, we layer in more Nomad tools—always in service of the workflow, never as random features.

  • A Mindset that actually helps. You’ll have permission to make a mess, restart without fear, and learn in small, satisfying chunks.

By the end, you’ll be able to:

  • Navigate Nomad comfortably and set up a distraction-free interface

  • Block out strong shapes, refine clean planes, and add crisp stylized accents

  • Understand what’s under the hood—vertices, edges, and quads—so tools finally “click”

  • Use symmetry wisely (and break it when your model needs life)

  • Export cleanly and know your next steps toward printing, painting, or game-ready workflows

This is for absolute beginners - artists who love creating in apps like Procreate but feel intimidated by 3D. If that’s you, you’ll feel seen, supported, and—most importantly—successful. We’ll keep projects fun and finishable so you stack wins quickly and build real momentum.

You’re not just buying videos; you’re getting a starter system you can reuse for heads, props, creatures—anything you imagine. Once the workflow is second nature, adding Nomad’s more advanced tools is simple (and surprisingly fun).

And because I want this to feel completely safe to try, your purchase is covered by a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you don’t feel more capable and confident with Nomad after working through the lessons, you shouldn’t pay. Simple as that.

Ready to turn “that looks impossible!” into “that looks great! I did that...”?


Enroll in Nomad Sculpt: Solid Foundations now and start sculpting, with a workflow you’ll use for years. I'll see you on the course!

Simon

title: Revit Electrical Design: From Beginner to Professional
description:
This course contains the use of artificial intelligence.

I have been working as a project manager in the field of electrical project design for many years. One of the most frequently asked questions I receive recently is how to design an electrical installation project with Revit. Since I noticed that there are not many proper resources on the internet regarding this subject, I decided to prepare this training set to inform my colleagues.

With the advancement of technology, Autodesk AutoCAD has started to become insufficient for project designs. Autodesk, realizing this need, introduced Revit as an alternative. Thanks to this software, it is possible to design all projects and disciplines in 3D. Although the demand for this program is increasing today, I observed that there are not enough training resources available.

You don’t need to be an engineer to participate in this training and learn the software. Having a basic knowledge of electrical terms will be sufficient. In this training, we will cover all stages of an electrical project designed with Revit, from the initial phase to final delivery. Once you successfully complete this training, you can confidently state in your job interviews or CV that you are capable of using Revit.

Before starting the training, you must have Autodesk Revit installed on your computer. All templates, families, and projects I use in the training will be shared with my students. I also pay attention to responding quickly to any questions that may arise during the training.

title: Gas Turbine Blade Design with SolidWorks – 5 Projects Based
description:
Are you ready to master the design of gas turbine blades — both compressor and turbine — with real-world projects?

This project-based course will take you through five industrial-grade projects, from interpreting technical drawings to creating fully-detailed CAD models in SolidWorks. It's designed to bridge the gap between theory and industry practice, making you job-ready and confident in turbine blade design and modeling.

What You'll Learn

  • How to read and interpret industrial drawings of gas turbine blades

  • CAD modeling techniques for compressor and turbine blades in SolidWorks

  • Best practices for design intent, constraints, and features

  • Working with real-world parameters, tolerances, and profiles

  • Creating assembly-ready models suitable for manufacturing

This course is ideal for:

  • Mechanical / Aerospace engineering students

  • CAD designers and drafters

  • Professionals working in gas turbine or turbo-machinery industries

  • Anyone interested in advanced CAD modeling and industrial design

The power generation in a gas turbine engine mainly depends upon the amount of air it can suck from the atmosphere and how efficiently the airflow through the engine to finally get utilized in the turbine and exhaust section.

All these depend on the 1000’s of blades that are used inside the gas turbine engine. Blades are the most critical and abused part inside the gas turbine engine which is the power plant of an aircraft that gives it the ability to propel ahead.

The gas turbine engine’s application is limitless as it has great power to weight ratio. It is used for powering aeroplanes, helicopters, ships, trains, power plants, pumps, gas compressors, tanks, etc.

And behind each successful gas turbine is a set of highly sophisticated and precise blades.

In this course; we have the right content covered which will give you ample knowledge of blades.

At the beginning of this course ; you will be given a fundamental orientation on a Gas turbine engine. After that we shall discuss about the importance of the Blades in the Gas turbine engines' operation and power generation.

Further, we will start an Industrial Project on the 5th stage blade of the Gas Turbine Engine Compressor Module of an Aero Engine.

All the knowledge that you will get in this course is purely industrial based and this will upgrade your knowledge level to match with the Gas Turbine industry professionals.
